leetcodeåˆ·é¢˜ç¬”è®°

leetcode åˆ·é¢˜ python c++
æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¸ç®—æ³•
å‘å¸ƒæ—¥æœŸ:   2021-04-20
æ›´æ–°æ—¥æœŸ:   2021-10-22
æ–‡ç« å­—æ•°:   35k

2021-04-20è™½ç„¶å·²ç»æ‹¿åˆ°äº†ğŸ§å‚çš„æš‘æœŸå®ä¹ offerï¼Œä½†è‡ªå·±åŸºæœ¬å¤„äº0åˆ·é¢˜çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œæƒ³åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªå¤šæœˆä¹‹åå°±è¦å¼€å§‹ç§‹æ‹›ï¼ˆæå‰æ‰¹ï¼‰å¿ƒé‡Œå°±æ…Œå¾—ä¸€åŒ¹ğŸ˜Ÿã€‚å› æ­¤èµ¶ç´§åˆ©ç”¨è¿™æ®µæ—¶é—´åˆ·ä¸€åˆ·ç®—æ³•é¢˜ï¼Œä»¥å…ç§‹æ‹›æ—¶ç¬”è¯•éƒ½è¿‡ä¸äº†ğŸ™ˆã€‚æœ¬æ–‡ä¸»è¦ç”¨æ¥è®°å½•åˆ·é¢˜è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­è‡ªå·±è®¤ä¸ºçš„é‡ç‚¹ã€éš¾ç‚¹ä»¥åŠè‡ªå·±å¯¹å„ç±»é¢˜å‹çš„æ€»ç»“ã€‚

1. æ•°ç»„

1.1 åŸºç¡€çŸ¥è¯†

  • å®šä¹‰: æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å­˜æ”¾åœ¨è¿ç»­å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´ä¸Šçš„ç›¸åŒç±»å‹æ•°æ®çš„é›†åˆã€‚
  • æ•°ç»„çš„ä¸‹æ ‡éƒ½æ˜¯ä»0å¼€å§‹ã€‚
  • å¯ç›´æ¥é€šè¿‡ä¸‹è¡¨ç´¢å¼•å–å€¼ã€‚
  • åˆ é™¤æˆ–å¢æ·»å…ƒç´ æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç§»åŠ¨å…¶ä»–å…ƒç´ çš„åœ°å€ã€‚
  • c++ä¸­vectorå’ŒarrayåŒºåˆ«:
    • std::vector
      • æ˜¯æ¨¡æ¿ç±»(template class)ï¼Œæ˜¯c++ç‰¹æœ‰çš„ç»“æ„ä½“ã€‚
      • ç”±åŠ¨æ€æ•°ç»„å®ç°ï¼Œä¸å®šé•¿ï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€ç®¡ç†å†…å­˜ã€‚
      • åŠŸèƒ½ç›¸æ¯”arrayæ›´å¤šï¼Œä½†æ•ˆç‡ä¼šä½ä¸€äº›ã€‚
    • std::array
      • æ˜¯å†…ç½®ç»“æ„ä½“ï¼Œå¯¹æ ‡cä¸­çš„æ•°ç»„ã€‚
      • æä¾›è¿ç»­çš„ã€å¯ç´¢å¼•çš„å…ƒç´ åºåˆ—ã€‚
      • å®šé•¿ï¼Œä¸”ä¸èƒ½ä¿®æ”¹ï¼ˆé™¤éæ˜¯PODå¹³å‡¡æ•°ç»„ä¸”ç”±mallocåˆ†é…ï¼‰ã€‚
    • ç®€å•æ€»ç»“
      • ä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ— è„‘ç”¨vectorå°±è¡Œã€‚
      • è‹¥ç¡®å®šæ— éœ€æ”¹æ•°ç»„å¤§å°ï¼Œç”¨arrayé€Ÿåº¦æ›´å¿«äº›ã€‚

1.2 å…¸å‹ä¾‹é¢˜

1.2.1 æœç´¢æ’å…¥ä½ç½®(No.35)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ’åºæ•°ç»„å’Œä¸€ä¸ªç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œåœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›å…¶ç´¢å¼•ã€‚å¦‚æœç›®æ ‡å€¼ä¸å­˜åœ¨äºæ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼Œè¿”å›å®ƒå°†ä¼šè¢«æŒ‰é¡ºåºæ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ— é‡å¤å…ƒç´ ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1:
è¾“å…¥: [1,3,5,6], 5
è¾“å‡º: 2
ç¤ºä¾‹2:
è¾“å…¥: [1,3,5,6], 2
è¾“å‡º: 1
ç¤ºä¾‹3:
è¾“å…¥: [1,3,5,6], 7
è¾“å‡º: 4
ç¤ºä¾‹4:
è¾“å…¥: [1,3,5,6], 0
è¾“å‡º: 0

æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•

éå†è¯¥æœ‰åºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œå°†æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¸ç›®æ ‡å€¼è¿›è¡Œå¯¹æ¯”ï¼Œå¯åˆ†ä¸ºä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µ:

  • å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ä¸ç›®æ ‡å€¼ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å½“å‰å…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•;
  • å½“å‰å…ƒç´ å¤§äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ˜¯å‡åºï¼Œåç»­å…ƒç´ è‚¯å®šéƒ½å¤§äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ç´¢å¼•;
  • å½“å‰å…ƒç´ å°äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œç»§ç»­å¾ªç¯ï¼Œè‹¥åˆ°æœ€åä¸€å…ƒç´ ä»å°äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ç´¢å¼•+1ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.35 æœç´¢æ’å…¥ä½ç½® ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution35(object):
    # æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•
    def searchInsert(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        len_array = len(nums)
        for i in range(len_array):
            if nums[i] >= target:  # å¤§äºæˆ–ç­‰äºçš„æƒ…å½¢éƒ½æ˜¯è¿”å›i
                return i
            elif nums[i] < target and i == (len_array -1):
                return i + 1


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.35
    s = Solution35()
    in_put_1 = [1, 3, 5, 6]
    in_put_2 = 5
    print(s.searchInsert(in_put_1, in_put_2))

äºŒåˆ†æ³•

çœ‹åˆ°é¢˜ä¸­çš„æ•°ç»„æ˜¯æœ‰åºçš„åº”å°è¯•ç”¨äºŒåˆ†æ³•æ¥è§£å†³ã€‚äºŒåˆ†æ³•çš„å…³é”®æ˜¯äºŒåˆ†ååŒºé—´çš„è¾¹ç•Œå®šä¹‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ•´ä½“ä»£ç è¦ä¿æŒå§‹ç»ˆä¸€è‡´ã€‚é¦–å…ˆå®šä¹‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡startå’Œendæ¥ç¡®å®šäºŒåˆ†åŒºé—´[start, end]ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸ºé—­åŒºé—´ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¾ªç¯çš„ç»ˆæ­¢æ¡ä»¶ä¸ºstart > endã€‚å¯¹æ¯ä¸ªäºŒåˆ†åŒºé—´ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆè®¡ç®—å…¶ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ çš„å…¨å±€ç´¢å¼•mid = start + (end - start + 1) // 2ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ†ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µåˆ¤æ–­:

  • ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ ç­‰äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ å…¨å±€ç´¢å¼•;
  • ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ å¤§äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ç›®æ ‡å€¼åªå¯èƒ½åœ¨å·¦äºŒåˆ†åŒºé—´ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¿®æ”¹å³è¾¹ç•Œend = mid - 1;
  • ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ å°äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ç›®æ ‡å€¼åªå¯èƒ½åœ¨å³äºŒåˆ†åŒºé—´ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¿®æ”¹å·¦è¾¹ç•Œstart = mid + 1
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(logn)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.35 æœç´¢æ’å…¥ä½ç½® ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution35(object):
    # äºŒåˆ†æ³•
    def searchInsertBisection(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        len_array = len(nums)
        start = 0
        end = len_array - 1
        while end >= start:  # äºŒåˆ†åŒºé—´ä¸ºé—­åŒºé—´[start, end]
            mid = start + (end - start + 1) // 2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                return mid
            elif nums[mid] > target:
                end = mid - 1
            elif nums[mid] < target:
                start = mid + 1

        return start


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.35
    s = Solution35()
    in_put_1 = [1, 3, 5, 6]
    in_put_2 = 5
    print(s.searchInsertBisection(in_put_1, in_put_2))

1.2.2 ç§»é™¤å…ƒç´ (No.27)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„numså’Œä¸€ä¸ªå€¼valï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦åŸåœ°ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰æ•°å€¼ç­‰äºvalçš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›ç§»é™¤åæ•°ç»„çš„æ–°é•¿åº¦ã€‚ä¸è¦ä½¿ç”¨é¢å¤–çš„æ•°ç»„ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä½ å¿…é¡»ä»…ä½¿ç”¨O(1)é¢å¤–ç©ºé—´å¹¶åŸåœ°ä¿®æ”¹è¾“å…¥æ•°ç»„ã€‚å…ƒç´ çš„é¡ºåºå¯ä»¥æ”¹å˜ã€‚ä½ ä¸éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘æ•°ç»„ä¸­è¶…å‡ºæ–°é•¿åº¦åé¢çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1:
è¾“å…¥: nums = [3,2,2,3], val = 3
è¾“å‡º: 2, nums = [2,2]
è§£é‡Š: å‡½æ•°åº”è¯¥è¿”å›æ–°çš„é•¿åº¦ 2, å¹¶ä¸” nums ä¸­çš„å‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å‡ä¸º 2ã€‚ä½ ä¸éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘æ•°ç»„ä¸­è¶…å‡ºæ–°é•¿åº¦åé¢çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œå‡½æ•°è¿”å›çš„æ–°é•¿åº¦ä¸º 2 ï¼Œè€Œ nums = [2,2,3,3] æˆ– nums = [2,2,0,0]ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šè¢«è§†ä½œæ­£ç¡®ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚
ç¤ºä¾‹2:
è¾“å…¥: nums = [0,1,2,2,3,0,4,2], val = 2
è¾“å‡º: 5, nums = [0,1,3,0,4]
è§£é‡Š: å‡½æ•°åº”è¯¥è¿”å›æ–°çš„é•¿åº¦ 5, å¹¶ä¸” nums ä¸­çš„å‰äº”ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¸º 0, 1, 3, 0, 4ã€‚æ³¨æ„è¿™äº”ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¯ä¸ºä»»æ„é¡ºåºã€‚ä½ ä¸éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘æ•°ç»„ä¸­è¶…å‡ºæ–°é•¿åº¦åé¢çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚

æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•

æ•°ç»„åªèƒ½è¦†ç›–å€¼è€Œä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥åˆ é™¤ï¼Œç”¨ä¸¤å±‚å¾ªç¯å³å¯è§£å†³ã€‚æ³¨æ„ç‚¹:

  • pythonç”¨forå¾ªç¯åœ¨å†…éƒ¨æ”¹å˜å¾ªç¯å˜é‡ä»…åœ¨è¯¥æ¬¡å¾ªç¯ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œå› æ­¤è¿™é¢˜ç”¨whileå¾ªç¯æ›´å®¹æ˜“å†™ä¸€äº›ã€‚
  • ç¬¬ä¸€å±‚å¾ªç¯å˜é‡iä»¥åŠæ•°ç»„å¤§å°sizeåœ¨åˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¹‹åéœ€è¦-1ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n^2)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.27 ç§»é™¤å…ƒç´  ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution27(object):
    # æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•
    def removeElement(self, nums, val):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type val: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        # for å¾ªç¯
        # num_del = 0
        # skip = 0
        # for i in range(len(nums)):
        #     if nums[i - num_del] == val:
        #         for j in range(len(nums) - (num_del + skip + 1)):
        #             nums[i - num_del + j] = nums[i - num_del + j + 1]
        #         num_del += 1
        #     else:
        #         skip += 1
        # 
        # return len(nums) - num_del

        # while å¾ªç¯
        i = 0
        size = len(nums)
        while i < size:
            if nums[i] == val:
                j = i
                while j < size - 1:
                    nums[j] = nums[j + 1]
                    j += 1
                i -= 1
                size -= 1

            i += 1

        return size


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.27
    s = Solution27()
    in_put_1 = [3, 2, 2, 3]
    in_put_2 = 3
    print(s.removeElement(in_put_1, in_put_2))

åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•

é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆå’Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªforå¾ªç¯ä¸‹å®Œæˆä¸¤ä¸ªforå¾ªç¯çš„å·¥ä½œã€‚åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•ï¼ˆå¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ³•ï¼‰åœ¨æ•°ç»„å’Œé“¾è¡¨çš„æ“ä½œä¸­æ˜¯éå¸¸å¸¸è§çš„ï¼Œå¾ˆå¤šè€ƒå¯Ÿæ•°ç»„å’Œé“¾è¡¨æ“ä½œçš„é¢è¯•é¢˜ï¼Œéƒ½ä½¿ç”¨åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•ã€‚
æ ¸å¿ƒæ€è·¯: ä¸Šè¿°æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•çš„æ¯æ¬¡ç§»åŠ¨å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯ç§»ä¸€æ­¥ä½†éœ€ç§»å¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šæ¯ä¸ªä¸ç­‰äºvarçš„å…ƒç´ åªéœ€ç§»ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œè€Œæ­¥é•¿ç­‰äºè¯¥å…ƒç´ å‰è¾¹ç­‰äºvarå…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ¥è®°å½•å³å¯:

  • è‹¥å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ä¸ç­‰äºvalï¼Œåˆ™å°†å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆçš„å€¼èµ‹äºˆæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œç„¶åå¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆéƒ½+1ã€‚
  • è‹¥å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ç­‰äºvalï¼Œå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆ+1ï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆä¸å˜ã€‚
  • å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆéå†å®Œæ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å¾ªç¯ç»“æŸã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.27 ç§»é™¤å…ƒç´  ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution27(object):
    # --------------------åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•--------------------
    def removeElementDoubleP(self, nums, val):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type val: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        slow_p = 0
        for fast_p in range(len(nums)):
            if nums[fast_p] != val:
                nums[slow_p] = nums[fast_p]  # ä¸ç­‰äºvalçš„å…ƒç´ åªéœ€ç§»åŠ¨ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œæ­¥ä¼ä¸ºfast_p - slow_p
                slow_p += 1

        return slow_p


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.27
    s = Solution27()
    in_put_1 = [3, 2, 2, 3]
    in_put_2 = 3
    print(s.removeElementDoubleP(in_put_1, in_put_2))

1.2.3 é•¿åº¦æœ€å°çš„å­æ•°ç»„(No.209)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå«æœ‰nä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°çš„æ•°ç»„å’Œä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°targetã€‚æ‰¾å‡ºè¯¥æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ»¡è¶³å…¶å’Œâ‰¥ targetçš„é•¿åº¦æœ€å°çš„è¿ç»­å­æ•°ç»„[numsl, numsl+1, ..., numsr-1, numsr]ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›å…¶é•¿åº¦ã€‚å¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„å­æ•°ç»„ï¼Œè¿”å›0ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1:
è¾“å…¥: target = 7, nums = [2,3,1,2,4,3]
è¾“å‡º: 2
è§£é‡Š: å­æ•°ç»„ [4,3] æ˜¯è¯¥æ¡ä»¶ä¸‹çš„é•¿åº¦æœ€å°çš„å­æ•°ç»„ã€‚
ç¤ºä¾‹2:
è¾“å…¥: target = 4, nums = [1,4,4]
è¾“å‡º: 1
ç¤ºä¾‹3:
è¾“å…¥: target = 11, nums = [1,1,1,1,1,1,1,1]
è¾“å‡º: 0

æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•

ä¸¤å±‚å¾ªç¯ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€å±‚å¾ªç¯éå†æ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå¾ªç¯ç”¨äºå¯¹æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å‘åç´¯åŠ ï¼Œä½†åº”è¯¥æ³¨æ„ï¼Œä¸€æ—¦åŠ è‡³æ»¡è¶³>=targetçš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒå±‚å¾ªç¯å°±å¯ä»¥è·³å‡ºã€‚

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n^2), åœ¨leetcodeä¸Šç›´æ¥è¶…æ—¶äº†ğŸ˜¢
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.209 é•¿åº¦æœ€å°çš„å­æ•°ç»„ ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution209(object):
    # --------------------æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•--------------------
    def minSubArrayLen(self, target, nums):
        """
        :type target: int
        :type nums: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        min_len = len(nums) + 1
        for i in range(len(nums)):
            sum_temp = 0
            for j in range(len(nums) - i):
                sum_temp += nums[i + j]
                if sum_temp >= target:
                    min_len = min(min_len, j + 1)
                    break  # ç›´æ¥è·³å‡ºå¾ªç¯

        if min_len > len(nums):
            return 0
        else:
            return min_len


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.209
    s = Solution209()
    in_put_1 = 7
    in_put_2 = [2, 3, 1, 2, 4, 3]
    print(s.minSubArrayLen(in_put_1, in_put_2))

æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£æ³•

ä¸Šè¿°æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•çš„ç¼ºé™·åœ¨äºç¬¬äºŒå±‚å¾ªç¯å­˜åœ¨å†—ä½™ï¼Œä»¥target = 7, nums = [2,3,1,2,4,3]ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯å¾—åˆ°æœ€å°å­æ•°ç»„[2,3,1,2]ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡å†…å¾ªç¯å…¶å®æ²¡å¿…è¦è®¡ç®—3+1å¹¶åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè‹¥3+1>targetåˆ™ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯å¾—åˆ°çš„æœ€å°å­æ•°ç»„ä¸å¯èƒ½ä¸º[2,3,1,2]ã€‚æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£æ³•åˆ™é¿å…äº†è¿™ç§å†—ä½™è®¡ç®—ï¼Œå…¶æœ¬è´¨ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ç§åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆåˆ†åˆ«æŒ‡å‘å­åºåˆ—çš„å¤´ã€å°¾ã€‚

  • è‹¥å­åºåˆ—ä¹‹å’Œ<targetï¼Œåˆ™å°¾æŒ‡é’ˆ+1ã€‚
  • è‹¥å­åºåˆ—ä¹‹å’Œ>targetï¼Œåˆ™è®°å½•å­åºåˆ—é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå¹¶å°†å¤´æŒ‡é’ˆå³ç§»ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å­åºåˆ—ä¹‹å’Œ<targetã€‚
  • å¯åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œè‹¥å­åºåˆ—é•¿åº¦=1åˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.209 é•¿åº¦æœ€å°çš„å­æ•°ç»„ ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution209(object):
    # --------------------æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£æ³•--------------------
    def minSubArrayLenSlidingWindow(self, target, nums):
        """
        :type target: int
        :type nums: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        start = 0
        min_len = len(nums) + 1
        sum_temp = 0
        for end in range(len(nums)):
            sum_temp += nums[end]
            while sum_temp >= target:
                min_len = min(min_len, end - start + 1)
                if min_len == 1:  # å¤§å°ä¸º1æ—¶å¯ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
                    return min_len
                sum_temp -= nums[start]
                start += 1

        if min_len > len(nums):
            return 0
        else:
            return min_len


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.209
    s = Solution209()
    in_put_1 = 7
    in_put_2 = [2, 3, 1, 2, 4, 3]
    print(s.minSubArrayLenSlidingWindow(in_put_1, in_put_2))

1.2.4 èºæ—‹çŸ©é˜µII(No.59)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°nï¼Œç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«1åˆ°n2æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä¸”å…ƒç´ æŒ‰é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆé¡ºåºèºæ—‹æ’åˆ—çš„n x næ­£æ–¹å½¢çŸ©é˜µmatrixã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1
è¾“å…¥: n = 3
è¾“å‡º: [[1,2,3],[8,9,4],[7,6,5]]
ç¤ºä¾‹2
è¾“å…¥: n = 1
è¾“å‡º: [[1]]

æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ³•

æ¨¡æ‹ŸçŸ©é˜µç”Ÿæˆçš„è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œåˆå§‹ä½ç½®ä¸ºå·¦ä¸Šè§’ï¼Œåˆå§‹æ–¹å‘ä¸ºå³ã€‚

  • è½¬å˜æ–¹å‘åˆ¤å®š: è‹¥ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥çš„ä½ç½®è¶…å‡ºè¾¹ç•Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯ä¹‹å‰è®¿é—®è¿‡çš„ä½ç½®(è¢«è®¿é—®è¿‡çš„ä½ç½®çš„å€¼éƒ½å¤§äº0)ï¼Œåˆ™é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆæ”¹å˜ä¸€æ¬¡æ–¹å‘ã€‚
  • å¦‚æ­¤åå¤å¡«å…¥æ€»å…±n^2ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ã€‚
  • æ³¨æ„pythonåˆ—è¡¨ä¸å¸¸æ•°çš„ä¹˜æ³•: [0] * 3 = [0, 0, 0]
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n^2)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)ï¼Œä¸è€ƒè™‘è¿”å›çš„çŸ©é˜µã€‚
# No.59 èºæ—‹çŸ©é˜µII ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution59(object):
    # --------------------æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ³•--------------------
    def generateMatrix(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: List[List[int]]
        """
        mat = [[0] * n for _ in range(n)]  # ç”Ÿæˆå…¨0çŸ©é˜µ
        dirs = [(0, 1), (1, 0), (0, -1), (-1, 0)]  # é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆå››ä¸ªæ–¹å‘
        row, col, dirIdx = 0, 0, 0

        for i in range(n**2):
            mat[row][col] = i + 1
            dr, dc = dirs[dirIdx]
            r, c = row + dr, col + dc
            if r < 0 or r >= n or c < 0 or c >= n or mat[r][c] > 0:  # è¾¹ç•Œåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œæ˜¯å¦æ¢æ–¹å‘
                dirIdx = (dirIdx + 1) % 4
                dr, dc = dirs[dirIdx]
            row, col = row + dr, col + dc

        return mat


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.59
    s = Solution59()
    in_put = 3
    print(s.generateMatrix(in_put))

åˆ†å±‚æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ³•

å¯ä»¥æŠŠè¿™ç§æ–¹æ³•æ¯”å–»ä¸ºå‰¥æ´‹è‘±æ³•ï¼Œä»å¤–è‡³å†…ä¸€å±‚ä¸€å±‚è®¡ç®—ã€‚å®šä¹‰æ¯ä¸€å±‚çš„å·¦ä¸Šç‚¹ã€å³ä¸‹ç‚¹åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º(x1,y1)å’Œ(x2,y2)ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆæ–¹å‘è®¡ç®—ï¼Œæ¯æ¡è¾¹çš„åŒºé—´ä¸ºå·¦é—­å³å¼€ã€‚

  • æ¯è®°ç®—å®Œä¸€å±‚ï¼Œå°±å°†å·¦ä¸Šç‚¹ä¸å³ä¸‹ç‚¹å†…ç¼©ã€‚
  • å¾ªç¯ç»ˆæ­¢æ¡ä»¶ä¸ºå·¦ä¸Šç‚¹ä¸å³ä¸‹ç‚¹é”™ä½ã€‚
  • è‹¥nä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™æ‰‹åŠ¨è¡¥æœ€ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹çš„å€¼ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n^2)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1), ä¸è€ƒè™‘è¿”å›çš„çŸ©é˜µã€‚
# No.59 èºæ—‹çŸ©é˜µII ç±»å‹ï¼šæ•°ç»„
class Solution59(object):
    # --------------------åˆ†å±‚æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ³•--------------------
    def generateMatrixLayer(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: List[List[int]]
        """
        mat = [[0] * n for _ in range(n)]  # ç”Ÿæˆå…¨0çŸ©é˜µ
        x1, y1, x2, y2 = 0, 0, n - 1, n - 1  # å·¦ä¸Šã€å³ä¸‹ç‚¹
        num = 1
        while x1 <= x2 and y1 <= y2:
            for i in range(y2 - y1):  # å‘å³
                mat[x1][y1 + i] = num
                num += 1
            for i in range(x2 - x1):  # å‘ä¸‹
                mat[x1 + i][y2] = num
                num += 1
            for i in range(y2 - y1):  # å‘å·¦
                mat[x2][y2 - i] = num
                num += 1
            for i in range(x2 - x1):  # å‘ä¸Š
                mat[x2 - i][y1] = num
                num += 1

            x1 += 1
            y1 += 1
            x2 -= 1
            y2 -= 1

        if n % 2:  # nä¸ºå¥‡æ•°æ—¶å¤„ç†ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹
            mat[n // 2][n // 2] = n ** 2

        return mat


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.59
    s = Solution59()
    in_put = 3
    print(s.generateMatrixLayer(in_put))

1.2.5 é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆæ‰“å°çŸ©é˜µ(No.JZ29)

class SolutionJZ29(object):
    def spiralOrder(self, matrix):
        """
        :type matrix: List[List[int]]
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        if not matrix:
            return []

        # æ–¹å‘æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
        # dirs = [(0,1),(1,0),(0,-1),(-1,0)]
        # m = len(matrix)
        # n = len(matrix[0])
        # idx,x,y = 0,0,-1
        # s = set()
        # res = []
        # for i in range(m*n):
        #     d = dirs[idx]
        #     nx,ny = x+d[0], y+d[1]
        #     if nx<0 or ny<0 or nx>=m or ny>=n or (nx,ny) in s:
        #         idx = (idx + 1) % 4
        #         d = dirs[idx]
        #         nx,ny = x+d[0], y+d[1]

        #     res.append(matrix[nx][ny])
        #     s.add((nx,ny))
        #     x,y = nx,ny

        # return res

        # è¾¹ç•Œæ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
        l,t,r,b = 0,0,len(matrix[0])-1,len(matrix)-1
        res = []
        while True:
            for i in range(l,r+1): res.append(matrix[t][i])
            t += 1
            if t > b: break
            for i in range(t,b+1): res.append(matrix[i][r])
            r -= 1
            if l > r: break
            for i in range(r,l-1,-1): res.append(matrix[b][i])
            b -= 1
            if t > b: break
            for i in range(b,t-1,-1): res.append(matrix[i][l])
            l += 1
            if l > r: break

        return res

1.2.6 äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„æŸ¥æ‰¾(No.JZ4)

class SolutionJZ4(object):
    def findNumberIn2DArray(self, matrix, target):
        """
        :type matrix: List[List[int]]
        :type target: int
        :rtype: bool
        """
        if not matrix or not matrix[0]:
            return False

        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•
        # m,n = len(matrix), len(matrix[0])
        # for i in range(m):
        #     row = matrix[i]
        #     if target < row[0]:
        #         return False
        #     elif target > row[-1]:
        #         continue

        #     l, r = 0, n - 1

        #     while l <= r:
        #         mid = (l+r) // 2
        #         if row[mid] == target:
        #             return True
        #         elif row[mid] > target:
        #             r = mid - 1
        #         else:
        #             l = mid + 1
            
        # return False

        # çº¿æ€§æŸ¥æ‰¾
        i, j = len(matrix) - 1, 0
        while i >= 0 and j < len(matrix[0]):
            if matrix[i][j] == target:
                return True
            elif matrix[i][j] > target:
                i -= 1
            else:
                j += 1

        return False

1.2.7 æ¥é›¨æ°´(No.42)

class Solution42(object):
    def trap(self, height):
        """
        :type height: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        # æš´åŠ›æ³•,è¶…æ—¶
        # res = 0
        # for i in range(len(height)):
        #     m_l,m_r = 0,0
        #     for j in range(i,len(height)):
        #         m_r = max(m_r, height[j])
        #     for j in range(i,-1,-1):
        #         m_l = max(m_l, height[j])

        #     res += min(m_l,m_r) - height[i]

        # return res

        # é¢å¤–æ•°ç»„è®°å½•å·¦å³æœ€å¤§å€¼
        # m_l = [0] * len(height)
        # temp_l = height[0]
        # for i in range(len(height)):
        #     m_l[i] = max(temp_l,height[i])
        #     temp_l = m_l[i]

        # m_r = [0] * len(height)
        # temp_r = height[-1]
        # for i in range(len(height)-1,-1,-1):
        #     m_r[i] = max(temp_r,height[i])
        #     temp_r = m_r[i]

        # res = 0
        # for i in range(len(height)):
        #     res += min(m_l[i],m_r[i]) - height[i]

        # return res

        # åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ
        res = 0
        l,r = 0,len(height) - 1
        m_l,m_r = 0,0
        while l < r:
            if height[l] < height[r]:
                m_l = max(m_l,height[l])
                res += m_l - height[l]
                l += 1
            else:
                m_r = max(m_r, height[r])
                res += m_r - height[r]
                r -= 1

        return res

1.2.8 æ‰‘å…‹ç‰Œä¸­çš„é¡ºå­(No.JZ61)

class SolutionJZ61(object):
    def isStraight(self, nums):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :rtype: bool
        """
        # è®¡ç®—0çš„æ•°é‡ï¼Œéå†æŠµæ¶ˆ
        nums = sorted(nums)
        num_0 = 0
        for i in nums:
            if i == 0: num_0 += 1
            else: break

        # for i in range(num_0+1, len(nums)):
        #     if nums[i] == nums[i - 1] + 1:
        #         continue
        #     elif nums[i] == nums[i - 1]:
        #         return False
        #     else:
        #         num_0 -= (nums[i] - nums[i -1] - 1)
        #         if num_0 < 0:
        #             return False
        # return True

        # max-min<5
        min_num = nums[num_0]
        max_num = nums[-1]
        if max_num - min_num >= 5:
            return False

        for i in range(num_0+1, len(nums)):
            if nums[i] == nums[i-1]:
                return False

        return True

1.2.9 å’Œä¸ºsçš„ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°å­—(No.JZ57)

class SolutionJZ57(object):
    def twoSum(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: int
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        l, r = 0, len(nums)-1
        while l < r:
            if nums[l] + nums[r] > target:
                r -= 1
            elif nums[l] + nums[r] < target:
                l += 1
            else:
                return [nums[l],nums[r]]

1.2.10 å’Œä¸ºsçš„è¿ç»­æ­£æ•°åºåˆ—(No.JZ57II)

class SolutionJZ57II:
    def findContinuousSequence(self, target: int) -> List[List[int]]:
        # æ•°å­¦è®¡ç®—ï¼Œç¡®å®šåºåˆ—çš„é•¿åº¦ä¸Šé™ï¼Œå¯¹å›ºå®šçš„é•¿åº¦å¯è§£å¾—åºåˆ—èµ·å§‹ç‚¹
        n = int((math.sqrt(1+8*target)-1) / 2)
        res = []
        for i in range(n, 1, -1):
            if int((2*target/i + 1 - i) / 2) != (2*target/i + 1 - i) / 2:
                continue
            else:
                idx = int((2*target/i + 1 - i) / 2)
                res.append([j for j in range(idx, idx + i)])

        return res

        # æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£
        # i, j = 1,2
        # res = []
        # while i < j:
        #     if (i+j)*(j-i+1)/2 == target:
        #         res.append([k for k in range(i,j+1)])
        #         j += 1
        #     elif (i+j)*(j-i+1)/2 > target:
        #         i += 1
        #     else:
        #         j += 1

        # return res

1.2.11 è°ƒæ•´æ•°ç»„é¡ºåºä½¿å¥‡æ•°ä½äºå¶æ•°å‰é¢(No.JZ21)

class SolutionJZ21:
    def exchange(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[int]:
        # åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ
        l,r = 0,len(nums)-1
        while l<r:
            while l<r and nums[r]%2==0: r-=1
            while l<r and nums[l]%2==1: l+=1
            nums[l],nums[r] = nums[r],nums[l]

        return nums

1.2.12 åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªæœ‰åºæ•°ç»„(No.88)

class Solution88:
    def merge(self, nums1: List[int], m: int, nums2: List[int], n: int) -> None:
        """
        Do not return anything, modify nums1 in-place instead.
        """
        # æ­£åºåŒæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œé¢å¤–æ•°ç»„
        # res = [0] * (m+n)
        # i,j,k = 0,0,0
        # while i<m or j<n:
        #     if j>=n or i<m and nums1[i]<=nums2[j]:
        #         res[k] = nums1[i]
        #         i += 1
        #     elif i>=m or j<n and nums1[i]>nums2[j]:
        #         res[k] = nums2[j]
        #         j += 1

        #     k += 1

        # for i in range(m+n):
        #     nums1[i] = res[i]

        # é€†åºåŒæŒ‡é’ˆ
        p1,p2,k = m-1,n-1,m+n-1
        while k >= 0:
            if p2<0 or p1>=0 and nums1[p1]>=nums2[p2]:
                nums1[k] = nums1[p1]
                p1 -= 1
            # elif p1<0 or p2>=0 and nums1[p1]<nums2[p2]:
            else:
                nums1[k] = nums2[p2]
                p2 -= 1

            k -= 1

1.2.13 å¯»æ‰¾æ—‹è½¬æ’åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„æœ€å°å€¼(No.153)

class Solution153:
    def findMin(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡éœ€å’Œå³è¾¹ç•Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä¸å·¦è¾¹ç•Œæ¯”è¾ƒ
        left,right = 0,len(nums)-1
        while left < right:
            mid = (left+right) // 2
            if nums[mid] > nums[right]:  # æœ€å°å€¼åœ¨å³åŒºé—´
                left = mid + 1
            elif nums[mid] < nums[right]:  # æœ€å°å€¼åœ¨å·¦åŒºé—´
                right = mid

        return nums[left]

1.2.14 å¯»æ‰¾æ—‹è½¬æ’åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„æœ€å°å€¼II(No.154)

class Solution154:
    def findMin(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘é‡å¤æƒ…å†µ
        left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
        while left < right:
            mid = (left + right) // 2
            if nums[mid] > nums[right]:  # æœ€å°å€¼åœ¨å³åŒºé—´
                left = mid + 1
            elif nums[mid] < nums[right]:  # æœ€å°å€¼åœ¨å·¦åŒºé—´
                right = mid
            else:
                right -= 1  # ç›¸ç­‰æ— æ³•åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå³è¾¹ç•Œå‡ä¸€ç¼©å°åŒºé—´

        return nums[left]

1.2.15 æœç´¢æ—‹è½¬æ’åºæ•°ç»„(No.33)

class Solution33:
    def search(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•
        left,right = 0,len(nums)-1
        while left <= right:
            mid = (left + right) // 2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                return mid
            if nums[mid] > nums[right]:  # mid åœ¨å·¦åŒºé—´
                if target >= nums[left] and target < nums[mid]:  # targetåœ¨[l,mid)
                    right = mid - 1
                else:
                    left = mid + 1
            else:  # mid åœ¨å³åŒºé—´
                if target > nums[mid] and target <= nums[right]:  # targetåœ¨(mid,right]
                    left = mid + 1
                else:
                    right = mid - 1

        return -1

1.2.16 æœç´¢æ—‹è½¬æ’åºæ•°ç»„II(No.81)

class Solution81:
    def search(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> bool:
        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•
        left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
        while left <= right:
            mid = (left + right) // 2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                return True

            if nums[mid] > nums[right]:  # midåœ¨å·¦åŒºé—´
                if target >= nums[left] and target < nums[mid]:
                    right = mid - 1
                else:
                    left = mid + 1
            elif nums[mid] < nums[right]:  # midåœ¨å³åŒºé—´
                if target > nums[mid] and target <= nums[right]:
                    left = mid + 1
                else:
                    right = mid - 1
            else:
                right -= 1

        return False

1.2.17 ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ’åˆ—(No.31)

class Solution31:
    def nextPermutation(self, nums: List[int]) -> None:
        """
        Do not return anything, modify nums in-place instead.
        """
        # ä»åå‘å‰æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç›¸é‚»å‡åºå¯¹(i,j)ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶[j,end]ä¸€å®šé™åº
        # ä»åéå†[j,end],æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§äºnums[i]çš„æ•°nums[k],äº¤æ¢nums[i],nums[k]
        # å°†[j,end]å‡åº
        n = len(nums)
        flag = False
        for i in range(n-1,0,-1):
            if nums[i] > nums[i-1]:
                flag = True
                for k in range(n-1,i-1,-1):
                    if nums[k] > nums[i-1]:
                        nums[i-1],nums[k] = nums[k],nums[i-1]
                        break

                break

        if not flag: i = 0
        for j in range((n-i)//2):
            nums[j+i],nums[n-1-j] = nums[n-1-j],nums[j+i]

1.2.18 åˆå¹¶åŒºé—´(No.56)

class Solution56:
    def merge(self, intervals: List[List[int]]) -> List[List[int]]:
        length = len(intervals)
        if length == 1:
            return intervals
        # æŒ‰åŒºé—´å·¦è¾¹ç•Œæ’åº
        intervals = sorted(intervals, key = lambda x:x[0])
        res = []
        left = intervals[0]
        # é€ä¸ªéå†åˆå¹¶
        for i in range(length-1):
            right = intervals[i+1]
            if right[0] <= left[1]:
                    left = [left[0],max(left[1],right[1])]
            else:
                res.append(left)
                left = right

        res.append(left)
        return res

1.2.19 åˆ é™¤æœ‰åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„é‡å¤é¡¹(No.26)

class Solution26:
    def removeDuplicates(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        length = len(nums)
        if length <= 1:
            return length
        # è§£å†³è¿™ç±»é—®é¢˜çš„é€šç”¨æ€è·¯ï¼š
        # idxæŒ‡å‘è¦å¡«çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œå¯åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ºå¯ä»¥é‡å¤çš„å€¼kï¼Œiéå†æ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„
        # è‹¥nums[i]ä¸idxå‰kä¸ªæ•°éƒ½ç›¸åŒï¼Œåˆ™ç»§ç»­ï¼Œå¦åˆ™åœ¨idxå¤„å¡«å…¥nums[i]ï¼Œidx++
        idx = 1
        for i in range(1,length):
            if nums[i] == nums[idx-1]:
                continue
            else:
                nums[idx] = nums[i]
                idx += 1

        return idx

1.2.20 åˆ é™¤æœ‰åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„é‡å¤é¡¹II(No.80)

class Solution80:
    def removeDuplicates(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        length = len(nums)
        if length <= 2:
            return length

        idx = 2
        for i in range(2,length):
            if nums[i]==nums[idx-1] and nums[i]==nums[idx-2]:
                continue
            else:
                nums[idx] = nums[i]
                idx += 1

        return idx

1.3 å…¸å‹ä¾‹é¢˜

1.3.1 å¯»æ‰¾ä¸¤ä¸ªæ­£åºæ•°ç»„çš„ä¸­ä½æ•°(No.4)

class Solution4:
    def findMedianSortedArrays(self, nums1: List[int], nums2: List[int]) -> float:
        # åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªæ­£åºæ•°ç»„ï¼ŒO(m+n)
        # def merge_two(nums1,nums2):
        #     m,n = len(nums1),len(nums2)
        #     if m==0: return nums2
        #     if n==0: return nums1
        #     ans = [0] * (m+n)
        #     i,j,k = 0,0,0
        #     while i<m or j<n:
        #         if j==n:
        #             ans[k] = nums1[i]
        #             i += 1
        #         elif i==m:
        #             ans[k] = nums2[j]
        #             j += 1
        #         elif nums1[i] <= nums2[j]:
        #             ans[k] = nums1[i]
        #             i += 1
        #         elif nums1[i] > nums2[j]:
        #             ans[k] = nums2[j]
        #             j += 1

        #         k += 1

        #     return ans

        # merged_nums = merge_two(nums1,nums2)
        # length = len(merged_nums)
        # return merged_nums[length//2] if length%2==1 else (merged_nums[length//2]+merged_nums[length//2-1])/2

        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•ï¼Œä¸­ä½æ•°çš„æ€§è´¨ï¼šä¸¤è¾¹å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°ç›¸åŒï¼Œå·¦è¾¹æœ€å¤§å€¼å°äºå³è¾¹æœ€å°å€¼
        # nums1ä¸ºé•¿åº¦è¾ƒå°çš„æ•°ç»„
        if len(nums1) > len(nums2):
            nums1, nums2 = nums2, nums1

        m,n = len(nums1), len(nums2)
        # åˆ†å‰²çº¿å·¦è¾¹å…ƒç´ æ€»æ•°
        cnt_left = (m+n+1) // 2

        # åœ¨ nums1 çš„åŒºé—´ [0, m] é‡ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾æ°å½“çš„åˆ†å‰²çº¿ï¼Œ
        # ä½¿å¾— nums1[i - 1] <= nums2[j] && nums2[j - 1] <= nums1[i]
        left, right = 0,m
        while left < right:
            i = left + (right-left+1)//2  # å‘ä¸Šå–æ•´
            j = cnt_left - i
            if nums1[i-1] > nums2[j]:
                right = i-1
            else:
                left = i

        i = left
        j = cnt_left - i
        # å¤„ç†ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µ
        nums1LeftMax = float('-inf') if i == 0 else nums1[i-1]
        nums1RightMin = float('inf') if i == m else nums1[i]
        nums2LeftMax = float('-inf') if j == 0 else nums2[j-1]
        nums2RightMin = float('inf') if j == n else nums2[j]

        if (m+n) % 2==1:
            return max(nums1LeftMax, nums2LeftMax)
        else:
            return (max(nums1LeftMax, nums2LeftMax) + min(nums1RightMin, nums2RightMin)) / 2

1.3.2 ç¼ºå¤±çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•°(No.41)

class Solution41:
    def firstMissingPositive(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        # åŸåœ°å“ˆå¸Œï¼Œæœªå‡ºç°çš„æœ€å°æ­£æ•°å–å€¼èŒƒå›´ä¸º[1,n+1]
        # äº¤æ¢ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ä¸‹æ ‡iå¯¹åº”i+1
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            while 1<=nums[i]<=n and nums[i]!=i+1 and nums[nums[i]-1]!=nums[i]:
                nums[nums[i]-1],nums[i] = nums[i],nums[nums[i]-1]

        # éå†æŸ¥æ‰¾
        for i in range(1,n+1):
            if i != nums[i-1]:
                return i

        return n+1

1.3.3 æ•°ç»„ä¸­é‡å¤çš„æ•°æ®(No.442)

class Solution442:
    def findDuplicates(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[int]:
        # åŸåœ°å“ˆå¸Œ
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            while nums[nums[i]-1] != nums[i]:
                nums[nums[i]-1], nums[i] = nums[i], nums[nums[i]-1]

        res = []
        for i in range(n):
            if nums[i] != i+1:
                res.append(nums[i])

        return res

1.3.4 æ‰¾åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ¶ˆå¤±çš„æ•°å­—(No.448)

class Solution448:
    def findDisappearedNumbers(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[int]:
        # åŸåœ°å“ˆå¸Œ
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            while nums[nums[i]-1] != nums[i]:
                nums[nums[i]-1], nums[i] = nums[i], nums[nums[i]-1]

        res = []
        for i in range(n):
            if i+1 != nums[i]:
                res.append(i+1)

        return res

1.3.5 æ—‹è½¬å›¾åƒ(No.48)

class Solution48:
    def rotate(self, matrix: List[List[int]]) -> None:
        """
        Do not return anything, modify matrix in-place instead.
        """
        # æ€è·¯ï¼šæ²¿å¯¹è§’çº¿ç¿»è½¬ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œå†æ°´å¹³ç¿»è½¬ä¸€æ¬¡
        n = len(matrix)
        # å¯¹è§’çº¿ç¿»è½¬
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(i+1,n):
                matrix[i][j],matrix[j][i] = matrix[j][i],matrix[i][j]

        # æ°´å¹³ç¿»è½¬
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(n//2):
                matrix[i][j],matrix[i][n-j-1] = matrix[i][n-j-1],matrix[i][j]

1.3.6 åœ¨æ’åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾å…ƒç´ çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå’Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®(No.34)

class Solution34:
    def searchRange(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> List[int]:
        # ä¸¤æ¬¡äºŒåˆ†æ³•
        if not nums:
            return [-1,-1]
        left,right = 0,len(nums)-1
        # æ‰¾æœ€å·¦è¾¹çš„target
        while left<right:
            mid = left + (right-left)//2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                right = mid
            elif nums[mid] > target:
                right = mid - 1
            else:
                left = mid + 1

        if nums[left] != target:
            return [-1,-1]

        l,r = left,len(nums)-1
        
        # æ‰¾æœ€å³è¾¹çš„target
        while l<r:
            mid = l + (r-l+1)//2  # æ³¨æ„éœ€è¦å‘ä¸Šå–æ•´
            if nums[mid] == target:
                l = mid
            elif nums[mid] < target:
                l = mid + 1
            else:
                r = mid-1

        return [left,l]

1.3.7 æœç´¢äºŒç»´çŸ©é˜µII(No.240)

class Solution240:
    def searchMatrix(self, matrix: List[List[int]], target: int) -> bool:
        # ä»å³ä¸Šè§’å¼€å§‹æœç´¢ï¼Œä¸€æ­¥æ­¥ç¼©è¡Œç¼©åˆ—
        m,n = len(matrix),len(matrix[0])
        i,j = 0,n-1
        while i<m and j>=0:
            if matrix[i][j] == target:
                return True
            elif matrix[i][j] > target:
                j -= 1
            else:
                i += 1

        return False

1.3.8 å¯»æ‰¾å³°å€¼(No.162)

class Solution162:
    def findPeakElement(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•ï¼Œå¾€é€’å¢çš„æ–¹å‘ç¼©è¿›
        left,right = 0,len(nums)-1
        while left<right:
            mid = left + (right-left)//2
            if mid > 0 and nums[mid-1]<nums[mid] and nums[mid+1]<nums[mid]:
                return mid
            if nums[mid] < nums[mid+1]:
                left = mid + 1
            else:
                right = mid

        return left

1.3.9 åœ¨Då¤©å†…é€è¾¾åŒ…è£¹çš„èƒ½åŠ›(No.1011)

class Solution1011:
    def shipWithinDays(self, weights: List[int], days: int) -> int:
        # äºŒåˆ†æ³•ï¼Œå¯¹æœ€ä½è¿è½½èƒ½åŠ›äºŒåˆ†
        def check(mid):
            need_days = 0
            sum_weight = 0
            for i in range(len(weights)):
                sum_weight += weights[i]
                if sum_weight > mid:
                    need_days += 1
                    sum_weight = weights[i]

            return need_days+1 > days

        left, right = max(weights), sum(weights)
        while left < right:
            mid = left + (right - left) // 2
            if check(mid):
                left = mid + 1
            else:
                right = mid

        return left

1.3.10 è·³è·ƒæ¸¸æˆ(No.55)

class Solution55:
    def canJump(self, nums: List[int]) -> bool:
        # è´ªå¿ƒï¼Œéå†æ›´æ–°æœ€è¿œè·ç¦»
        max_dis = 0
        for i,num in enumerate(nums):
            if i > max_dis:
                return False
            max_dis = max(max_dis, i + nums[i])
            if max_dis >= len(nums) - 1:
                return True

1.3.11 è·³è·ƒæ¸¸æˆII(No.45)

class Solution:
    def jump(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        # [start,end)ä¸ºéå†çš„èŒƒå›´
        start = 0
        end = 1
        res = 0
        while end < len(nums):
            max_dis = 0
            for i in range(start,end):
                max_dis = max(max_dis, i + nums[i])

            start = end
            end = max_dis + 1
            res += 1

        return res

1.4 æ•°ç»„æ€»ç»“

  • æ•°ç»„æœ€é‡è¦çš„ç‰¹æ€§: å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´æ˜¯è¿ç»­çš„ã€‚
  • åˆ é™¤æˆ–å¢æ·»å…ƒç´ æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€ç§»åŠ¨å…¶ä»–å…ƒç´ ã€‚
  • æœ‰åºæ•°ç»„åº”å°è¯•äºŒåˆ†æ³•ã€‚
  • åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸é“¾è¡¨ä¸­å¾ˆå¸¸è§ã€‚
  • æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£æ³•æ˜¯ä¸€ç§è¾ƒä¸ºå·§å¦™çš„åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•ã€‚
  • åŒºé—´å®šä¹‰å¾ˆé‡è¦ï¼Œç¡®å®šä¹‹åæ•´ä¸ªç¨‹åºåº”ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´ã€‚
  • æ¶‰åŠéœ€å†…éƒ¨æ”¹å¾ªç¯å˜é‡çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œpythonä¸­ç”¨whileå¾ªç¯æ›´å¥½ã€‚
  • æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç±»é¢˜éœ€é‡è§†è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶ã€‚

2. é“¾è¡¨

2.1 åŸºç¡€çŸ¥è¯†

  • å®šä¹‰: é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯ä¸€ç§é€šè¿‡æŒ‡é’ˆä¸²è”åœ¨ä¸€èµ·çš„çº¿æ€§ç»“æ„ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯ç”±ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†ç»„æˆï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯æ•°æ®åŸŸä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯æŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸï¼ˆå­˜æ”¾æŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆï¼‰ï¼Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸæŒ‡å‘nullï¼ˆå³ç©ºæŒ‡é’ˆï¼‰ã€‚
  • å•é“¾è¡¨
  • åŒé“¾è¡¨
    • æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‡å‘ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
    • æ—¢å¯ä»¥å‘å‰æŸ¥è¯¢ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å‘åæŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚
  • å¾ªç¯é“¾è¡¨
    • é“¾è¡¨é¦–å°¾ç›¸è¿ã€‚
    • å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥è§£å†³çº¦ç‘Ÿå¤«ç¯é—®é¢˜ã€‚
  • å­˜å‚¨æ–¹å¼: é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­ä¸æ˜¯è¿ç»­åˆ†å¸ƒçš„ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯æ•£ä¹±åˆ†å¸ƒåœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­çš„æŸåœ°å€ä¸Šï¼Œåˆ†é…æœºåˆ¶å–å†³äºæ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿçš„å†…å­˜ç®¡ç†ã€‚
  • é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹å®šä¹‰
struct ListNode {
    int val;  // èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸Šå­˜å‚¨çš„å…ƒç´ 
    ListNode *next;  // æŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆ
    ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(NULL) {}  // èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
    };
class ListNode(object):
    def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):
        self.val = val
        self.next = next

# åŒé“¾è¡¨
class ListNodeDouble(object):
    def __init__(self, val=0, next=None, prev=None):
        self.val = val
        self.next = next
        self.prev = prev
  • åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹: å°†æŒ‡å‘è¦åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
  • æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹: å°†æ’å…¥å¤„å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå†å°†æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘æ’å…¥å¤„åèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
  • æ€§èƒ½å¯¹æ¯”:
    • æ•°ç»„: æ’å…¥oråˆ é™¤O(n) | æŸ¥è¯¢O(1) | é€‚ç”¨äºæ•°æ®é‡å›ºå®šã€é¢‘ç¹æŸ¥è¯¢ã€è¾ƒå°‘å¢åˆ çš„åœºæ™¯
    • é“¾è¡¨: æ’å…¥oråˆ é™¤O(1) | æŸ¥è¯¢O(n) | é€‚ç”¨äºæ•°æ®é‡ä¸å›ºå®šã€é¢‘ç¹å¢åˆ ã€è¾ƒå°‘æŸ¥è¯¢çš„åœºæ™¯

2.2 å…¸å‹ä¾‹é¢˜

2.2.1 ç§»é™¤é“¾è¡¨å…ƒç´ (No.203)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨çš„å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹headå’Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°valï¼Œè¯·ä½ åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰æ»¡è¶³Node.val == valçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›æ–°çš„å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1

è¾“å…¥: head = [1,2,6,3,4,5,6], val = 6
è¾“å‡º: [1,2,3,4,5]
ç¤ºä¾‹2
è¾“å…¥: head = [ ], val = 1
è¾“å‡º: [ ]
ç¤ºä¾‹3
è¾“å…¥: head = [7,7,7,7], val = 7
è¾“å‡º: [ ]

ä¸€èˆ¬æ–¹æ³•

  • ä¸€èˆ¬èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å¤„ç†æ–¹å¼å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œå³å°†æŒ‡å‘è¦åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
  • å¤´ç»“ç‚¹åˆ†å¼€å¤„ç†ï¼Œè‹¥å¤´ç»“ç‚¹çš„å€¼ç­‰äºç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥å°†å¤´æŒ‡é’ˆå‘åç§»ä¸€ä½ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.203 ç§»é™¤é“¾è¡¨å…ƒç´  ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
class Solution203(object):
    # --------------------ä¸€èˆ¬æ–¹æ³•--------------------
    def removeElements(self, head, val):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :type val: int
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        # å¤„ç†å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
        while head and head.val == val:
            head = head.next

        cur = head
        while cur and cur.next:  # éœ€è¦curä¸ä¸ºNoneï¼Œå¦åˆ™cur.nextä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œè¾“å…¥ä¸º[]çš„æƒ…å½¢
            if cur.next.val == val:
                cur.next = cur.next.next
            else:
                cur = cur.next

        return head


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # --------------------æ‰“å°é“¾è¡¨--------------------
    def print_list(head):
        while head:
            print(head.val)
            head = head.next
    # No.203
    s = Solution203()
    in_put_4 = ListNode(val=2, next=None)
    in_put_3 = ListNode(val=4, next=in_put_4)
    in_put_2 = ListNode(val=3, next=in_put_3)
    head = ListNode(val=7, next=in_put_2)
    val = 4
    result = s.removeElements(head, val)
    print_list(result)

å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹æ³•(ä¼ªå¤´)

å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹å¹¿æ³›åº”ç”¨äºæ ‘å’Œé“¾è¡¨ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚ä¼ªå¤´ã€ä¼ªå°¾ã€æ ‡è®°ç­‰ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬æ˜¯çº¯åŠŸèƒ½çš„ï¼Œé€šå¸¸ä¸ä¿å­˜ä»»ä½•æ•°æ®ï¼Œå…¶ä¸»è¦ç›®çš„æ˜¯ä½¿é“¾è¡¨æ ‡å‡†åŒ–ï¼Œå¦‚ä½¿é“¾è¡¨æ°¸ä¸ä¸ºç©ºã€æ°¸ä¸æ— å¤´ã€ç®€åŒ–æ’å…¥å’Œåˆ é™¤ã€‚

  • è¿™é¢˜å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹å°†è¢«ç”¨äºä¼ªå¤´ã€‚
  • ç”±äºåŠ äº†ä¼ªå¤´ï¼ŒåŸæ¥çš„å¤´ç»“ç‚¹å¯ä»¥å½“åšæ™®é€šèŠ‚ç‚¹å¤„ç†ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.203 ç§»é™¤é“¾è¡¨å…ƒç´  ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
class Solution203(object):
    # --------------------å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹æ³•--------------------
    def removeElementsSentinel(self, head, val):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :type val: int
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        sentinel = ListNode(0, head)
        cur = sentinel
        while cur.next:  # ä¸éœ€è¦curåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå› ä¸ºcurå–ä¸åˆ°None
            if cur.next.val == val:
                cur.next = cur.next.next
            else:
                cur = cur.next

        return sentinel.next


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.203
    s = Solution203()
    in_put_4 = ListNode(val=2, next=None)
    in_put_3 = ListNode(val=4, next=in_put_4)
    in_put_2 = ListNode(val=3, next=in_put_3)
    head = ListNode(val=7, next=in_put_2)
    val = 4
    result = s.removeElementsSentinel(head, val)
    print_result(result)

2.2.2 è®¾è®¡é“¾è¡¨(No.707)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

è®¾è®¡é“¾è¡¨çš„å®ç°ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨å•é“¾è¡¨æˆ–åŒé“¾è¡¨ã€‚å•é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹åº”è¯¥å…·æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå±æ€§: valå’Œnext, valæ˜¯å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼ï¼Œnextæ˜¯æŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆ/å¼•ç”¨ã€‚å¦‚æœè¦ä½¿ç”¨åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œåˆ™è¿˜éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªå±æ€§prevä»¥æŒ‡ç¤ºé“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚å‡è®¾é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ˜¯0-indexçš„ã€‚
åœ¨é“¾è¡¨ç±»ä¸­å®ç°è¿™äº›åŠŸèƒ½:

  • get(index): è·å–é“¾è¡¨ä¸­ç¬¬ index ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼ã€‚å¦‚æœç´¢å¼•æ— æ•ˆï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›-1ã€‚
  • addAtHead(val): åœ¨é“¾è¡¨çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¹‹å‰æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ä¸º val çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚æ’å…¥åï¼Œæ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹å°†æˆä¸ºé“¾è¡¨çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
  • addAtTail(val): å°†å€¼ä¸º val çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿½åŠ åˆ°é“¾è¡¨çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ã€‚
  • addAtIndex(index,val): åœ¨é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ç¬¬ index ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¹‹å‰æ·»åŠ å€¼ä¸º val  çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚å¦‚æœ index ç­‰äºé“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œåˆ™è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹å°†é™„åŠ åˆ°é“¾è¡¨çš„æœ«å°¾ã€‚å¦‚æœ index å¤§äºé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ä¼šæ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚å¦‚æœindexå°äº0ï¼Œåˆ™åœ¨å¤´éƒ¨æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
  • deleteAtIndex(index): å¦‚æœç´¢å¼• index æœ‰æ•ˆï¼Œåˆ™åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ç¬¬ index ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚


ç¤ºä¾‹1

MyLinkedList linkedList = new MyLinkedList();
linkedList.addAtHead(1);
linkedList.addAtTail(3);
linkedList.addAtIndex(1,2);   //é“¾è¡¨å˜ä¸º1-> 2-> 3
linkedList.get(1);            //è¿”å›2
linkedList.deleteAtIndex(1);  //ç°åœ¨é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯1-> 3
linkedList.get(1);            //è¿”å›3

å•é“¾è¡¨

å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ç”¨ä½œä¼ªå¤´åœ¨é“¾è¡¨æ“ä½œä¸­ååˆ†æœ‰ç”¨ï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨éœ€æŒ‡å®šsizeå’Œhead(ä¼ªå¤´)å±æ€§ã€‚

  • å•é“¾è¡¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹åº”å…·å¤‡ä¸¤ä¸ªå±æ€§: valå’Œnextã€‚
  • å¢åŠ æˆ–åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ ååº”è®°å¾—å¯¹sizeè¿›è¡ŒåŒæ­¥åŠ å‡ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦:
    • addAtHead: O(1)
    • addAtTail: O(n), nä¸ºé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ã€‚
    • addAtIndex, get, deleteAtIndex: O(k), kä¸ºç´¢å¼•ã€‚
# No.707 è®¾è®¡é“¾è¡¨ ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
# --------------------å•é“¾è¡¨æ³•--------------------
class MyLinkedList(object):

    def __init__(self):
        self.size = 0
        self.head = ListNode(0)  # å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç”¨ä½œä¼ªå¤´

    def get(self, index):
        """
        :type index: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        if (self.size < index + 1) or index < 0:  # ç´¢å¼•æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¿”å›-1
            return -1

        cur = self.head
        for i in range(index + 1):
            cur = cur.next

        return cur.val

    def addAtHead(self, val):
        """
        :type val: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        old_head = self.head.next  # åŸæ¥çš„å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
        added_head = ListNode(val)
        self.head.next = added_head  # å°†å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘æ–°å¤´
        added_head.next = old_head  # å°†æ–°å¤´æŒ‡å‘æ—§å¤´
        self.size += 1  # é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦åŠ 1

    def addAtTail(self, val):
        """
        :type val: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        tail = ListNode(val)
        cur = self.head
        # while cur.next:  # è‹¥å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘ä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹åç§»ä¸€ä½ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
        for i in range(self.size):  # åˆ©ç”¨sizeä¿¡æ¯å¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šç§»åŠ¨æ¬¡æ•°
            cur = cur.next
        cur.next = tail  # å°†æœ€åçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘tail
        self.size += 1  # é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦åŠ 1

    def addAtIndex(self, index, val):
        """
        :type index: int
        :type val: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        if index <= 0:  # æ’å…¥å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
            self.addAtHead(val)
        elif 0 < index < self.size:  # æ’å…¥ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
            left = self.head
            insert = ListNode(val)
            for i in range(index):  # ä»ä¼ªå¤´ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°æ’å…¥å¤„å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹
                left = left.next

            right = left.next  # æ’å…¥å¤„å³èŠ‚ç‚¹
            left.next = insert  # ä»¤å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
            insert.next = right  # æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘å³èŠ‚ç‚¹
            self.size += 1  # é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦åŠ 1
        elif index == self.size:  # æ’å…¥å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹
            self.addAtTail(val)

    def deleteAtIndex(self, index):
        """
        :type index: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        if (self.size >= index + 1) and index >= 0:  # ç´¢å¼•æœ‰æ•ˆ
            left = self.head
            for i in range(index):  # ä»ä¼ªå¤´ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°åˆ é™¤å¤„å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹
                left = left.next

            right = left.next.next  # åˆ é™¤å¤„å³èŠ‚ç‚¹
            left.next = right  # å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹ç›´æ¥æŒ‡å‘å³èŠ‚ç‚¹
            self.size -= 1  # é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦å‡1

	
if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.707
    s = MyLinkedList()
    s.addAtHead(1)
    s.addAtTail(3)
    s.addAtIndex(1, 2)
    print(s.get(1))
    s.deleteAtIndex(1)
    print(s.get(1))

åŒé“¾è¡¨æ³•

åŒé“¾è¡¨ä¸å•é“¾è¡¨æœ€å¤§çš„ä¸åŒä¹‹å¤„åœ¨äºæ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ä»…ä¿å­˜æŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œä¹Ÿä¿å­˜äº†æŒ‡å‘å‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œå› æ­¤æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶å¯ä»¥åŒå‘ã€‚

  • åŒé“¾è¡¨å…·å¤‡çš„å±æ€§: val, next, prevã€‚
  • æ•ˆç‡æ¯”å•é“¾è¡¨é«˜ï¼Œä½†å çš„ç©ºé—´å¤šä¸€äº›ã€‚
  • åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶ä¸ä»…éœ€è¦ä¼ªå¤´ï¼Œä¹Ÿéœ€è¦ä¼ªå°¾ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦:
    • addAtHead, addAtTail: O(1)
    • get, addAtIndex, deleteAtIndex: O(min(k, n-k))ï¼Œkä¸ºç´¢å¼•ï¼Œnä¸ºé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.707 è®¾è®¡é“¾è¡¨ ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
# --------------------åŒé“¾è¡¨æ³•--------------------
class MyLinkedListDouble(object):

    def __init__(self):
        self.size = 0
        self.head, self.tail = ListNodeDouble(0), ListNodeDouble(0)  # å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç”¨ä½œä¼ªå¤´ã€ä¼ªå°¾
        self.head.next = self.tail
        self.tail.prev = self.head

    def get(self, index):
        """
        :type index: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        if (self.size < index + 1) or index < 0:  # ç´¢å¼•æ— æ•ˆï¼Œè¿”å›-1
            return -1

        if (index + 1) <= self.size // 2:
            cur = self.head
            for _ in range(index + 1):  # ä¾æ¬¡å‘åæŸ¥è¯¢
                cur = cur.next
        else:
            cur = self.tail
            for i in range(self.size - index):  # ä¾æ¬¡å‘å‰æŸ¥è¯¢
                cur = cur.prev

        return cur.val

    def addAtHead(self, val):
        """
        :type val: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        self.addAtIndex(0, val)

    def addAtTail(self, val):
        """
        :type val: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        self.addAtIndex(self.size, val)

    def addAtIndex(self, index, val):
        """
        :type index: int
        :type val: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        if index > self.size:
            return
        if index < 0:
            index = 0
        insert = ListNodeDouble(val)
        if (index + 1) <= self.size // 2:
            cur = self.head
            for _ in range(index):  # ä¾æ¬¡å‘åæŸ¥è¯¢
                cur = cur.next

            # æ’å…¥æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹
            insert.next = cur.next
            cur.next.prev = insert
            insert.prev = cur
            cur.next = insert
        else:
            cur = self.tail
            for i in range(self.size - index):  # ä¾æ¬¡å‘å‰æŸ¥è¯¢
                cur = cur.prev

            # æ’å…¥æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹
            cur.prev.next = insert
            insert.prev = cur.prev
            insert.next = cur
            cur.prev = insert

        self.size += 1  # é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦åŠ 1

    def deleteAtIndex(self, index):
        """
        :type index: int
        :rtype: None
        """
        if (self.size >= index + 1) and index >= 0:  # ç´¢å¼•æœ‰æ•ˆ
            if (index + 1) <= self.size // 2:
                cur = self.head
                for _ in range(index):  # ä¾æ¬¡å‘åæŸ¥è¯¢
                    cur = cur.next

                # åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹
                cur.next = cur.next.next
                cur.next.prev = cur
            else:
                cur = self.tail
                for i in range(self.size - index - 1):  # ä¾æ¬¡å‘å‰æŸ¥è¯¢, æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œçš„å¾ªç¯èŒƒå›´ä¸æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ä¸€æ ·!!!
                    cur = cur.prev

                # åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹
                cur.prev = cur.prev.prev
                cur.prev.next = cur

            self.size -= 1  # é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦å‡1


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.707
    s_d = MyLinkedListDouble()
    s_d.addAtHead(1)
    s_d.addAtTail(3)
    s_d.addAtIndex(1, 2)
    print(s_d.get(1))
    s_d.deleteAtIndex(1)
    print(s_d.get(1))

2.2.3 åè½¬é“¾è¡¨(No.206)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

åè½¬ä¸€ä¸ªå•é“¾è¡¨ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹:
è¾“å…¥: 1->2->3->4->5->NULL
è¾“å‡º: 5->4->3->2->1->NULL

åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•(è¿­ä»£)

å¹¶ä¸éœ€è¦å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨åŸé“¾è¡¨ä¸Šç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹å…ƒç´ æŒ‡é’ˆçš„æ–¹å‘ã€‚

  • å®šä¹‰preæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œè®°å½•å‰å…ƒç´ ï¼Œéœ€åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ºNoneã€‚
  • å®šä¹‰curæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œè®°å½•å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¾ªç¯ç»ˆæ­¢æ¡ä»¶ä¸ºcur is Noneã€‚
  • å®šä¹‰tempæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œè®°å½•åå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå› ä¸ºä¿®æ”¹curæŒ‡é’ˆåæ— æ³•é€šè¿‡curæ¥è·å–åç»­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
  • ç›´æ¥ç”¨headæ›¿ä»£curä¹Ÿè¡Œï¼Œå‡å°‘å ç”¨ç©ºé—´ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.206 åè½¬é“¾è¡¨ ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
class Solution206(object):
    # --------------------åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•-------------------
    def reverseList(self, head):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        pre = None  # éœ€åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ºNone
        cur = head
        while cur:
            temp = cur.next  # åœ¨å°†å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œéœ€è¦å‚¨å­˜ä¸‹ä¸€èŠ‚ç‚¹
            cur.next = pre  # å°†å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹åè½¬
            # åç§»ä¸€ä½
            pre = cur
            cur = temp

        return pre


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.206
    s = Solution206()
    in_put = MyLinkedList()
    for i in range(5):
        in_put.addAtTail(i + 1)
    print_list(in_put.head.next)
    result = s.reverseList(in_put.head.next)
    print_list(result)

é€’å½’æ³•

é€’å½’æ³•æ›´ä¸ºæŠ½è±¡ä¸€äº›ï¼Œæœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯åå‘è¿‡ç¨‹çš„è®¾è®¡ã€‚

  • é€’å½’çš„è·³å‡ºæ¡ä»¶è¦ç¡®å®šï¼Œå³å½“å‰å…ƒç´ æˆ–ä¸‹ä¸€å…ƒç´ ä¸ºç©ºã€‚
  • å…³é”®è¯­å¥head.next.next = headï¼Œç”¨æ¥åè½¬ï¼Œå³å°†å½“å‰å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹ä¸€å…ƒç´ æŒ‡å‘å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ã€‚
  • ä¸€æ¬¡åè½¬åï¼Œé“¾è¡¨å˜ä¸º1->2->3->4å’ŒNone<-4<-5ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
# No.206 åè½¬é“¾è¡¨ ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
class Solution206(object):
    # --------------------é€’å½’æ³•-------------------
    def reverseListRecursion(self, head):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        if head is None or head.next is None:  # é€’å½’è·³å‡ºæ¡ä»¶
            return head

        new_head = self.reverseListRecursion(head.next)
        head.next.next = head  # åè½¬
        head.next = None  # ä¿è¯åè½¬åé“¾è¡¨æœ«å°¾ä¸ºNone

        return new_head


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.206
    s = Solution206()
    in_put = MyLinkedList()
    for i in range(5):
        in_put.addAtTail(i + 1)
    print_list(in_put.head.next)
    result_R = s.reverseListRecursion(in_put.head.next)
    print_list(result_R)

2.2.4 åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨çš„å€’æ•°ç¬¬Nä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹(No.19)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨ï¼Œåˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨çš„å€’æ•°ç¬¬ n ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿”å›é“¾è¡¨çš„å¤´ç»“ç‚¹ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1

è¾“å…¥: head = [1,2,3,4,5], n = 2
è¾“å‡º: [1,2,3,5]
ç¤ºä¾‹2
è¾“å…¥: head = [1], n = 1
è¾“å‡º: []
ç¤ºä¾‹3
è¾“å…¥: head = [1,2], n = 1
è¾“å‡º: [1]

ä¸€èˆ¬æ–¹æ³•

æœ€å®¹æ˜“æƒ³åˆ°çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å…ˆéå†ä¸€éé“¾è¡¨è·å¾—é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ï¼Œç„¶åå°±èƒ½ç¡®å®šéœ€åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œå†éå†è‡³å¯¹åº”ä½ç½®è¿›è¡Œåˆ é™¤æ“ä½œå³å¯ã€‚

  • æ·»åŠ å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸€èˆ¬åŒ–ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(L), Lä¸ºé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.19 åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨çš„å€’æ•°ç¬¬Nä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
class Solution19(object):
    # --------------------ä¸€èˆ¬æ–¹æ³•-------------------
    def removeNthFromEnd(self, head, n):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :type n: int
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        # è·å–é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦
        cur = head
        size = 0
        while cur:
            size += 1
            cur = cur.next
        n = size - n  # é¡ºåºç´¢å¼•, nå–å€¼èŒƒå›´ä¸º[0, size-1]

        # åˆ é™¤ç´¢å¼•ä¸ºnçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
        sentinel = ListNode(0)  # ä¼ªå¤´
        sentinel.next = head
        left = sentinel
        for i in range(n):  # åç§»è‡³ç´¢å¼•èŠ‚ç‚¹å‰ä¸€ä¸ª
            left = left.next

        left.next = left.next.next  # åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹

        return sentinel.next


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.19
    s = Solution19()
    in_put = MyLinkedList()
    for i in range(5):
        in_put.addAtTail(i + 1)
    print_list(in_put.head.next)
    result = s.removeNthFromEnd(in_put.head.next, 2)
    print_list(result)

åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•

ç›¸æ¯”äºä¸€èˆ¬æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒåŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•åªéœ€éå†ä¸€éã€‚

  • åˆå§‹åŒ–å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘headï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ä¼ªå¤´ã€‚
  • æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³æ˜¯å‡è®¾å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å°±æ˜¯è¦åˆ é™¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆå¾€åç§»åŠ¨n-1æ­¥å°±åˆ°é“¾è¡¨æœ«å°¾äº†ã€‚
  • è‹¥å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆç§»åŠ¨n-1æ­¥æ²¡åˆ°æœ«å°¾ï¼Œåˆ™å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆåŒæ­¥ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œç›´è‡³æœ«å°¾ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘çš„å°±æ˜¯å¾…åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å‰ä¸€èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(L), Lä¸ºé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.19 åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨çš„å€’æ•°ç¬¬Nä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
class Solution19(object):
    # --------------------åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•-------------------
    def removeNthFromEndDouble(self, head, n):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :type n: int
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        sentinel = ListNode(0)  # ä¼ªå¤´
        sentinel.next = head
        slow = sentinel
        fast = head
        count = 0  # è®©å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆå…ˆèµ°n-1æ­¥ï¼Œä¹‹åå†åŒæ­¥èµ°
        while fast.next:
            fast = fast.next
            count += 1
            if count > n - 1:
                slow = slow.next

        slow.next = slow.next.next  # åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹

        return sentinel.next


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.19
    s = Solution19()
    in_put = MyLinkedList()
    for i in range(5):
        in_put.addAtTail(i + 1)
    print_list(in_put.head.next)
    result_D = s.removeNthFromEndDouble(in_put.head.next, 2)
    print_list(result_D)

2.2.5 ç¯å½¢é“¾è¡¨II(No.142)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨ï¼Œè¿”å›é“¾è¡¨å¼€å§‹å…¥ç¯çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚å¦‚æœé“¾è¡¨æ— ç¯ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›nullã€‚ä¸ºäº†è¡¨ç¤ºç»™å®šé“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ç¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨æ•´æ•°posæ¥è¡¨ç¤ºé“¾è¡¨å°¾è¿æ¥åˆ°é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ä½ç½®ï¼ˆç´¢å¼•ä»0å¼€å§‹ï¼‰ã€‚å¦‚æœposæ˜¯-1ï¼Œåˆ™åœ¨è¯¥é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰ç¯ã€‚æ³¨æ„ï¼Œposä»…ä»…æ˜¯ç”¨äºæ ‡è¯†ç¯çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¹¶ä¸ä¼šä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ é€’åˆ°å‡½æ•°ä¸­ã€‚ä¸å…è®¸ä¿®æ”¹ç»™å®šçš„é“¾è¡¨ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹

è¾“å…¥: head = [3,2,0,-4], pos = 1
è¾“å‡º: è¿”å›ç´¢å¼•ä¸º 1 çš„é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹
è§£é‡Š: é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç¯ï¼Œå…¶å°¾éƒ¨è¿æ¥åˆ°ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•

å¯ä»¥å°†è¯¥é¢˜åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸ºåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ç¯ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ä¸ºç¡®å®šå…¥ç¯èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

  • å®šä¹‰å¿«æ…¢ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ¯æ¬¡ç§»ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæ¯æ¬¡ç§»ä¸¤æ­¥ã€‚
  • å¦‚æœæœ‰ç¯ï¼Œåˆ™å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆä¸€å®šèƒ½è¿½ä¸Šæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆã€‚
  • ç¡®å®šå…¥ç¯èŠ‚ç‚¹æ¯”è¾ƒå·§å¦™ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¸€å®šçš„æ•°å­¦è®¡ç®—ã€‚ç›¸é‡æ—¶ï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆèµ°äº†a+bï¼Œå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆèµ°äº†a+b+n(b+c)ï¼Œç”±äºå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆé€Ÿåº¦æ˜¯æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆä¸¤å€ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰ç­‰å¼2(a+b)=a+b+n(b+c)ï¼Œè§£å¾—a=c+(n-1)(b+c)
  • å³ä»ç›¸é‡ç‚¹åˆ°å…¥ç¯ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»åŠ ä¸Šn-1ç¯é•¿ç­‰äºä»é“¾è¡¨å¤´åˆ°å…¥ç¯ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»ã€‚å› æ­¤ä»¤å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆé‡æ–°æŒ‡å‘headï¼Œç„¶åå’Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆåŒæ­¥å‘åæ¯æ¬¡ç§»ä¸€ä½ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬æœ€ç»ˆåœ¨å…¥ç¯èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤„ç›¸é‡ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.142 ç¯å½¢é“¾è¡¨II ç±»å‹ï¼šé“¾è¡¨
class Solution142(object):
    # --------------------åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•-------------------
    def detectCycle(self, head):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆ
        fast = head
        slow = head
        while fast:
            # æ— ç¯åˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
            if fast.next is None or fast.next.next is None:
                return

            slow = slow.next  # æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆç§»ä¸€æ­¥
            fast = fast.next.next  # å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆç§»ä¸¤æ­¥
            if fast == slow:  # è‹¥å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆè¿½ä¸Šæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ™ä¸€å®šæœ‰ç¯
                fast = head  # å°†å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘head
                # å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆåŒæ­¥ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œç›¸é‡å¤„å³å…¥ç¯èŠ‚ç‚¹
                while fast != slow:
                    fast = fast.next
                    slow = slow.next

                return slow


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.142
    s = Solution142()
    node_1 = ListNode(3)
    node_2 = ListNode(2)
    node_3 = ListNode(0)
    node_4 = ListNode(-4)
    node_1.next = node_2
    node_2.next = node_3
    node_3.next = node_4
    node_4.next = node_2
    result = s.detectCycle(node_1)
    print(result.val)

2.2.6 é“¾è¡¨ä¸­å€’æ•°ç¬¬kä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹(No.JZ22)

class SolutionJZ22(object):
    def getKthFromEnd(self, head, k):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :type k: int
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        l = 0
        cur = head
        while cur:
            l += 1
            cur = cur.next

        k = l - k + 1
        res = head
        for i in range(k-1):
            res = res.next

        return res

2.2.7 ä»å°¾åˆ°å¤´æ‰“å°é“¾è¡¨(No.JZ6)

class SolutionJZ6(object):
    def reversePrint(self, head):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        # è¾…åŠ©æ ˆ
        # temp = []
        # while head:
        #     temp.append(head.val)
        #     head = head.next

        # res = []
        # while temp:
        #     res.append(temp.pop())

        # return res

        # é€’å½’
        def recur(head):
            if not head:
                return []
            return recur(head.next) + [head.val]

        return recur(head)

2.2.8 ä¸¤æ•°ç›¸åŠ (No.2)

class Solution2(object):
    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1, l2):
        """
        :type l1: ListNode
        :type l2: ListNode
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        res = ListNode(0)
        cur = res
        temp = 0
        while True:
            cur.val = (l1.val + l2.val + temp) % 10
            temp = (l1.val + l2.val + temp) // 10
            
            if not l1.next and not l2.next:
                break
            if not l1.next:
                l1.next = ListNode(0)

            if not l2.next:
                l2.next = ListNode(0)

            cur.next = ListNode(0)
            cur = cur.next
            l1 = l1.next
            l2 = l2.next

        # æœ€åè¿˜æœ‰è¿›ä½çš„è¯éœ€è¦è¡¥ä¸€ä½
        if temp:
            cur.next = ListNode(temp)

        return res

2.2.9 åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªæ’åºçš„é“¾è¡¨(No.JZ25)

class SolutionJZ25(object):
    def mergeTwoLists(self, l1, l2):
        """
        :type l1: ListNode
        :type l2: ListNode
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        # å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹
        # sen = ListNode(0)
        # cur = sen
        # while l1 and l2:
        #     if l1.val <= l2.val:
        #         cur.next = l1
        #         l1 = l1.next
        #     else:
        #         cur.next = l2
        #         l2 = l2.next

        #     cur = cur.next            

        # cur.next = l1 if l1 else l2
        # return sen.next

        # é€’å½’
        if not l1: return l2
        if not l2: return l1
        if l1.val <= l2.val:
            l1.next =  self.mergeTwoLists(l1.next, l2)
            return l1
        else:
            l2.next = self.mergeTwoLists(l1, l2.next)
            return l2

2.2.10 K ä¸ªä¸€ç»„ç¿»è½¬é“¾è¡¨(No.25)

class Solution25:
    def reverseKGroup(self, head: ListNode, k: int) -> ListNode:
        def reverse(head):
            pre = None
            cur = head
            while cur:
                post = cur.next
                cur.next = pre
                pre = cur
                cur = post

            return pre

        # å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ‹†å¼€--ã€‹ç¿»è½¬--ã€‹è¿æ¥
        sen = ListNode(0)
        sen.next = head
        pre,end = sen,sen
        while end.next:
            for i in range(k):
                if end:
                    end = end.next
                else: break
            if not end: break
            post = end.next
            start = pre.next
            end.next = None
            pre.next = reverse(start)
            start.next = post
            pre = start
            end = pre

        return sen.next

2.2.11 ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…¬å…±èŠ‚ç‚¹(No.JZ52)

class SolutionJZ52:
    def getIntersectionNode(self, headA: ListNode, headB: ListNode) -> ListNode:
        # æš´åŠ›æ³•è¶…æ—¶O(N^2)
        # a,b = headA,headB
        # while a:
        #     while b:
        #         if a == b:
        #             return a
        #         b = b.next

        #     a = a.next
        #     b = headB

        # return 

        # å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
        # dic = set()
        # a,b = headA,headB
        # while a:
        #     if not a in dic:
        #         dic.add(a)
        #     a = a.next

        # while b:
        #     if b in dic:
        #         return b
        #     b = b.next

        # return

        # åŒæŒ‡é’ˆå¾ªç¯éå†,èµ°çš„è·¯ä¸ºé‡å¤é•¿åº¦åŠ å„è‡ªç‹¬ç«‹é•¿åº¦
        if not headA or not headB:
            return
        a,b = headA,headB
        while a or b:
            if a == b:
                return a    
            a = headB if not a else a.next
            b = headA if not b else b.next
        return

2.2.12 LRU ç¼“å­˜æœºåˆ¶(No.146)

class Node:
    def __init__(self,key=0,val=0,pre=None,nex=None):
        self.key = key
        self.val = val
        self.pre = pre
        self.next = nex


class DoubleList:
    def __init__(self,size=0):
        self.size = size
        # ä¼ªå¤´ï¼Œä¼ªå°¾
        self.head = Node()
        self.tail = Node()
        self.head.next, self.tail.pre = self.tail, self.head

    # åŠ å…¥å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
    def addfirst(self,node):
        temp = self.head.next
        self.head.next = node
        node.pre = self.head
        node.next = temp
        temp.pre = node
        self.size += 1

    # åˆ é™¤æŸä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
    def remove(self,node):
        pre,nex = node.pre,node.next
        pre.next,nex.pre = nex,pre
        self.size -= 1

    # åˆ é™¤å°¾éƒ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
    def removelast(self):
        node = self.tail.pre
        node.pre.next,self.tail.pre = self.tail,node.pre
        self.size -= 1
        return node


class LRUCache:

    def __init__(self, capacity: int):
        self.capacity = capacity
        self.dic = dict()
        self.cache = DoubleList()

    def get(self, key: int) -> int:
        if key not in self.dic:
            return -1
        else:
            node = self.dic[key]
            self.cache.remove(node)
            self.cache.addfirst(node)
            return node.val

    def put(self, key: int, value: int) -> None:
        if key in self.dic:
            node = self.dic[key]
            node.val = value
            self.cache.remove(node)
            self.cache.addfirst(node)
        else:
            if self.cache.size >= self.capacity:
                last_node = self.cache.removelast()
                self.dic.pop(last_node.key)
            node = Node(key,value)
            self.cache.addfirst(node)
            self.dic[key] = node

2.2.13 åè½¬é“¾è¡¨II(No.92)

class Solution92:
    def reverseBetween(self, head: ListNode, left: int, right: int) -> ListNode:
        # å¤´æ’æ³•, startä¸ºå¼€å§‹ç¿»è½¬çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
        sen = ListNode(0)
        sen.next = head
        start,cur = sen,head
        for i in range(left - 1):
            start = cur
            cur = cur.next

        temp = cur
        # ä¸æ–­åœ°å°†curåé¢çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤å¹¶åŠ å…¥åˆ°startåè¾¹
        for i in range(right - left):
            nex = cur.next
            cur.next = cur.next.next  # åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹
            start.next = nex
            nex.next = temp
            temp = nex

        return sen.next

2.2.14 åˆå¹¶Kä¸ªå‡åºé“¾è¡¨(No.23)

class Solution23:
    def mergeKLists(self, lists: List[ListNode]) -> ListNode:
        # ä¸¤ä¸¤åˆå¹¶
        def mergetwo(l1,l2):
            if not l1: return l2
            if not l2: return l1

            if l1.val <= l2.val:
                l1.next = mergetwo(l1.next, l2)
                return l1
            else:
                l2.next = mergetwo(l1,l2.next)
                return l2

        if not lists: return
        n = len(lists)
        l1 = lists[0]
        for i in range(1,n):
            l2 = lists[i]
            l1 = mergetwo(l1,l2)

        return l1

2.2.15 é‡æ’é“¾è¡¨(No.143)

class Solution143:
    def reorderList(self, head: ListNode) -> None:
        """
        Do not return anything, modify head in-place instead.
        """
        def my_reverse(l):
            pre = None
            cur = l
            while cur:
                temp = cur.next
                cur.next = pre
                pre = cur
                cur = temp

            return pre

        length,cur = 0,head
        while cur:
            cur = cur.next
            length += 1

        if length <= 2:
            return head

        # æ‰¾åˆ°åˆ†å‰²èŠ‚ç‚¹
        n1 = length // 2
        cur = head
        for i in range(n1):
            cur = cur.next

        # æŠŠé“¾è¡¨åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†l1,l2ï¼Œå¹¶å°†l2ç¿»è½¬
        l2 = cur.next
        l2 = my_reverse(l2)
        cur.next = None

        l1 = head
        while l2:
            temp1 = l1.next
            l1.next = l2
            temp2 = l2.next
            l2.next = temp1
            l1 = temp1
            l2 = temp2

        return head

2.3 å…¸å‹ä¾‹é¢˜

2.3.1 æ’åºé“¾è¡¨(No.148)

class Solution148:
    def sortList(self, head: ListNode) -> ListNode:
        # æš´åŠ›æ³•
        # vals = []
        # cur = head
        # while cur:
        #     vals.append(cur.val)
        #     cur = cur.next

        # vals = sorted(vals)
        # cur = head
        # i = 0
        # while cur:
        #     cur.val = vals[i]
        #     i += 1
        #     cur = cur.next

        # return head

        # å½’å¹¶æ’åº(é€’å½’)
        def recur(head):
            if not head or not head.next:
                return head

            # å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ‰¾åˆ°é“¾è¡¨ä¸­ç‚¹
            slow, fast = head, head
            while fast.next and fast.next.next:
                slow = slow.next
                fast = fast.next.next

            right_head = slow.next
            slow.next = None  # æˆªæ–­

            left = recur(head)
            right = recur(right_head)

            # merge
            cur = sen = ListNode(0)  # è¾…åŠ©èŠ‚ç‚¹
            while left and right:
                if left.val <= right.val:
                    cur.next = left
                    left = left.next
                else:
                    cur.next = right
                    right = right.next
                cur = cur.next

            cur.next = left if left else right

            return sen.next

        return recur(head)

2.3.2 å›æ–‡é“¾è¡¨(No.234)

class Solution:
    def isPalindrome(self, head: ListNode) -> bool:
        # O(n)æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ O(1)ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ ç¿»è½¬é“¾è¡¨
        # æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
        def my_reverse(head):
            pre = None
            cur = head
            while cur:
                temp = cur.next
                cur.next = pre
                pre = cur
                cur = temp

            return pre

        slow,fast = head,head
        while fast.next and fast.next.next:
            slow = slow.next
            fast = fast.next.next

        # ç¿»è½¬ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†é“¾è¡¨
        post = my_reverse(slow.next)
        p1,p2 = head,post
        while p2:
            if p1.val != p2.val:
                return False
            p1 = p1.next
            p2 = p2.next

        return True

2.4 é“¾è¡¨æ€»ç»“

  • ç±»å‹: å•é“¾è¡¨ã€åŒé“¾è¡¨ã€å¾ªç¯é“¾è¡¨ã€‚
  • å­˜å‚¨æ–¹å¼: ç¦»æ•£ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æŒ‡é’ˆè¿åœ¨ä¸€èµ·ã€‚
  • æ€§èƒ½: æŸ¥è¯¢æ…¢ï¼Œæ’å…¥/åˆ é™¤å¿«ã€‚
  • æ¶‰åŠå¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹éœ€è¦é¢å¤–å¤„ç†çš„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹å½“åšä¼ªå¤´ååˆ†æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚
  • åè½¬é“¾è¡¨ç»å¸¸è€ƒå¯Ÿï¼Œè¦æŒæ¡è¿­ä»£å’Œé€’å½’æ³•ã€‚
  • å¾ªç¯é“¾è¡¨åº”è€ƒè™‘åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•ã€‚

3. å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

3.1 åŸºç¡€çŸ¥è¯†

  • å®šä¹‰: å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨(Hash table)æ˜¯æ ¹æ®å…³é”®ç çš„å€¼è€Œç›´æ¥è¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚
  • æ•°ç»„å°±æ˜¯ä¸€å¼ å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ã€‚
  • å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½æ˜¯ç”¨äºå¿«é€Ÿåˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦å‡ºç°åœ¨é›†åˆé‡Œã€‚
  • å“ˆå¸Œå‡½æ•°: é€šè¿‡hashcodeå°†å…¶ä»–æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºä¸åŒçš„æ•°å€¼ï¼Œå†è¿›è¡Œå–æ¨¡ï¼Œå°±èƒ½å¾—åˆ°å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨çš„ç´¢å¼•ã€‚
  • å“ˆå¸Œç¢°æ’: è‹¥è¾“å…¥å¤§å°å¤§äºå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨çš„å¤§å°ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šå‡ºç°å¤šå¯¹ä¸€çš„ç°è±¡ï¼Œå³å¤šä¸ªè¾“å…¥å¯¹åº”å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨çš„åŒä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬è§£å†³æ–¹æ³•æœ‰äºŒ:
    • æ‹‰é“¾æ³•: å°†å‘ç”Ÿå†²çªçš„å…ƒç´ å­˜å‚¨åœ¨é“¾è¡¨ä¸­ã€‚
    • çº¿æ€§æ¢æµ‹æ³•: è¯¥æ–¹æ³•è¦æ±‚tablesizeå¤§äºdatasizeï¼Œä¾é å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸­çš„ç©ºä½æ¥è§£å†³ç¢°æ’é—®é¢˜ã€‚
  • å¸¸è§çš„ä¸‰ç§å“ˆå¸Œç»“æ„: æ•°ç»„ã€set(é›†åˆ)ã€map(æ˜ å°„)

3.2 å…¸å‹ä¾‹é¢˜

3.2.1 æœ‰æ•ˆçš„å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯(No.242)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™å®šä¸¤ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²så’Œtï¼Œç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ¥åˆ¤æ–­tæ˜¯å¦æ˜¯sçš„å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åªåŒ…å«å°å†™å­—æ¯ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1
è¾“å…¥: s = â€œanagramâ€, t = â€œnagaramâ€
è¾“å‡º: true
ç¤ºä¾‹2
è¾“å…¥: s = â€œratâ€, t = â€œcarâ€
è¾“å‡º: false

æ’åºæ³•

ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²äº’ä¸ºå¼‚ä½è¯ç­‰ä»·äºä¸¤ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ’åºåç›¸ç­‰ã€‚

  • è‹¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›False
  • åˆ†åˆ«å¯¹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²så’Œtè¿›è¡Œæ’åºã€‚
  • æ’åºåç›¸ç­‰åˆ™è¿”å›Trueå¦åˆ™è¿”å›Falseã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(nlogn)ï¼Œæ’åºä¸ºO(nlogn)ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒæ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ä¸ºO(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(logn)
# No.242 æœ‰æ•ˆçš„å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯ ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution242(object):
    # --------------------æ’åºæ³•--------------------
    def isAnagram(self, s, t):
        """
        :type s: str
        :type t: str
        :rtype: bool
        """
        # è‹¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›False
        if len(s) != len(t):
            return False

        # æ’åº
        s = sorted(s)
        t = sorted(t)
        return s == t


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.242
    s = Solution242()
    in_put1 = 'anagram'
    in_put2 = 'nagaram'
    result = s.isAnagram(in_put1, in_put2)
    print(result)

å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

è‹¥åªè€ƒè™‘26ä¸ªå°å†™å­—æ¯ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„æ¥è®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°çš„é¢‘æ¬¡ã€‚è‹¥è€ƒè™‘unicodeå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œåˆ™ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨(pythonä¸­ç”¨dictå³å¯)ã€‚

  • è‹¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›Falseã€‚
  • éå†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œè®°å½•å­—ç¬¦é¢‘æ¬¡ã€‚
  • éå†ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œå‡å»å¯¹åº”çš„é¢‘æ¬¡ã€‚è‹¥æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ å‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›Falseã€‚
  • pythonä¸­è·å–å•ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ç¼–ç : ord()
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(S)ï¼ŒS=26ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦é›†å¤§å°ã€‚
  • è‹¥åˆ©ç”¨pythonå†…ç½®æ¨¡å—ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸€å¥ä»£ç æå®š: return collections.Counter(s) == collections.Counter(t)ï¼Œéœ€import collectionsã€‚
# No.242 æœ‰æ•ˆçš„å­—æ¯å¼‚ä½è¯ ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution242(object):
    # --------------------å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨(æ•°ç»„)--------------------
    def isAnagramArray(self, s, t):
        """
        :type s: str
        :type t: str
        :rtype: bool
        """
        # è‹¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›False
        if len(s) != len(t):
            return False

        temp = [0] * 26  # åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤§å°ä¸º26çš„table
        for i in s:
            temp[ord(i) - ord('a')] += 1

        for j in t:
            temp[ord(j) - ord('a')] -= 1
            if temp[ord(j) - ord('a')] < 0:
                return False

        return True

    # --------------------å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨(å­—å…¸)--------------------
    def isAnagramArrayDict(self, s, t):
        """
        :type s: str
        :type t: str
        :rtype: bool
        """
        # è‹¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›False
        if len(s) != len(t):
            return False

        temp = {}
        for i in s:
            if i not in temp:
                temp[i] = 0
            temp[i] += 1

        for j in t:
            if j not in temp:
                return False
            temp[j] -= 1
            if temp[j] < 0:
                return False

        return True


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.242
    s = Solution242()
    in_put1 = 'an#gram'
    in_put2 = 'nagaram'
    result_A = s.isAnagramArray(in_put1, in_put2)
    result_D = s.isAnagramArrayDict(in_put1, in_put2)
    print(result_A)
    print(result_D)

3.2.2 ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„äº¤é›†(No.349)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™å®šä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ¥è®¡ç®—å®ƒä»¬çš„äº¤é›†ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1
è¾“å…¥: nums1 = [1,2,2,1], nums2 = [2,2]
è¾“å‡º: [2]
ç¤ºä¾‹2
è¾“å…¥: nums1 = [4,9,5], nums2 = [9,4,9,8,4]
è¾“å‡º: [9,4]

æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•

éå†æ•°ç»„1ï¼Œå¯¹å…¶æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ•°ç»„2ä¸­ã€‚

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(mn)ï¼Œmã€nåˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºæ•°ç»„1ã€æ•°ç»„2å¤§å°ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.349 ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„äº¤é›† ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution349(object):
    # --------------------æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•--------------------
    def intersection(self, nums1, nums2):
        """
        :type nums1: List[int]
        :type nums2: List[int]
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        result = []
        # éå†æ•°ç»„1
        for i in nums1:
            if i in nums2 and i not in result:  # è‹¥iåœ¨æ•°ç»„2ä¸­ä¸”ä¸åœ¨resultåˆ—è¡¨ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™å°†å…¶åŠ å…¥è‡³result
                result.append(i)

        return result


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.349
    s = Solution349()
    in_put1 = [1, 2, 2, 1]
    in_put2 = [2, 2]
    result = s.intersection(in_put1, in_put2)
    print(result)

å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆå­˜å‚¨å…ƒç´ ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥åœ¨O(1)çš„æ—¶é—´å†…åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦åœ¨é›†åˆä¸­ï¼Œä»è€Œé™ä½æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ã€‚

  • pythonä¸­ä½¿ç”¨set()å³å¯æ„å»ºå“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆã€‚
  • å¯¹è¾ƒçŸ­çš„å“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆè¿›è¡Œéå†ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å…¶å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦åœ¨è¾ƒé•¿çš„å“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆä¸­ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(m+n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(m+n)
  • ç©ºé—´æ¢æ—¶é—´ã€‚
# No.349 ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„äº¤é›† ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution349(object):
    # --------------------å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨æ³•--------------------
    def intersectionHash(self, nums1, nums2):
        """
        :type nums1: List[int]
        :type nums2: List[int]
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        # è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆ
        set1 = set(nums1)
        set2 = set(nums2)

        # éå†è¾ƒçŸ­çš„å“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆ
        if len(set1) < len(set2):
            return [x for x in set1 if x in set2]
        else:
            return [x for x in set2 if x in set1]


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.349
    s = Solution349()
    in_put1 = [1, 2, 2, 1]
    in_put2 = [2, 2]
    result_H = s.intersectionHash(in_put1, in_put2)
    print(result_H)

3.2.3 å¿«ä¹æ•°(No.202)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªç®—æ³•æ¥åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°næ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¿«ä¹æ•°ã€‚ã€Œå¿«ä¹æ•°ã€å®šä¹‰ä¸º:

  • å¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡å°†è¯¥æ•°æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºå®ƒæ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°å­—çš„å¹³æ–¹å’Œã€‚
  • ç„¶åé‡å¤è¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹ç›´åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªæ•°å˜ä¸º1ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ— é™å¾ªç¯ä½†å§‹ç»ˆå˜ä¸åˆ°1ã€‚
  • å¦‚æœå¯ä»¥å˜ä¸º1ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªæ•°å°±æ˜¯å¿«ä¹æ•°ã€‚


ç¤ºä¾‹1
è¾“å…¥: 19
è¾“å‡º: true
è§£é‡Š:
1^2 + 9^2 = 82
8^2 + 2^2 = 68
6^2 + 8^2 = 100
1^2 + 0^2 + 0^2 = 1
ç¤ºä¾‹2
è¾“å…¥: n = 2
è¾“å‡º: false

å“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆ

è¯¥é—®é¢˜å¯åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸ºè·å–ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ä¸ºåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å¾ªç¯ã€‚

  • å–æ•°çš„å„ä¸ªä½æ€è·¯: å°†æ•°å¯¹10å–ä½™å³å¾—æœ€åä¸€ä½ï¼Œå†å°†æ•°å¯¹10æ•´é™¤ï¼Œå¾ªç¯ç›´è‡³n//10 = 0ã€‚ä¹Ÿå¯è€ƒè™‘å°†æ•°è½¬ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²éå†ã€‚
  • åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å¾ªç¯æ€è·¯: æ¶‰åŠå¤šæ¬¡åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ˜¯å¦åœ¨é›†åˆé‡Œï¼Œåº”ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(logn)ï¼Œè·å–ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°çš„æ—¶é—´å ä¸»å¯¼ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(logn)
# No.202 å¿«ä¹æ•° ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution202(object):
    # --------------------å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨(å“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆ)æ³•--------------------
    def isHappy(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: bool
        """
        log = {n}  # åˆå§‹åŒ–å“ˆå¸Œé›†åˆ
        while n != 1:
            temp = str(n)
            new_n = 0
            for i in temp:  # è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°
                new_n += int(i)**2

            # åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å¾ªç¯
            if new_n in log:
                return False
            log.add(new_n)
            n = new_n

        return True


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.202
    s = Solution202()
    in_put = 19
    result = s.isHappy(in_put)
    print(result)

åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•

åå¤è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å…¶å®æ„æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªéšå¼çš„é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œå› æ­¤é—®é¢˜å°±è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºé“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ç¯ï¼Œç”¨å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ³•å³å¯è§£å†³ã€‚

  • æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ¯æ¬¡èµ°ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæ¯æ¬¡èµ°ä¸¤æ­¥ã€‚
  • è‹¥å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆè¿½ä¸Šæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰ç¯ã€‚
  • å¦åˆ™å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆå°†å…ˆåˆ°1ã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(logn)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.202 å¿«ä¹æ•° ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution202(object):
    # --------------------åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•--------------------
    def isHappyDouble(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: bool
        """
        def get_next(n):
            sum = 0
            while n > 0:
                n, digit = divmod(n, 10)
                sum += digit**2

            return sum

        fast = n
        slow = n
        while fast != 1:
            slow = get_next(slow)  # æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆèµ°ä¸€æ­¥
            fast = get_next(get_next(fast))  # å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆèµ°ä¸¤æ­¥
            if fast == 1:
                return True
            if slow == fast:  # å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆè¿½ä¸Šæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œè¯´æ˜æœ‰ç¯
                return False

        return True


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.202
    s = Solution202()
    in_put = 19
    result_D = s.isHappyDouble(in_put)
    print(result_D)

3.2.4 ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ(No.1)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„numså’Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°ç›®æ ‡å€¼targetï¼Œè¯·ä½ åœ¨è¯¥æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ‰¾å‡ºå’Œä¸ºç›®æ ‡å€¼çš„é‚£ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•´æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›å®ƒä»¬çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸‹æ ‡ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹1
è¾“å…¥: nums = [2,7,11,15], target = 9
è¾“å‡º: [0,1]
ç¤ºä¾‹2
è¾“å…¥: nums = [3,2,4], target = 6
è¾“å‡º: [1,2]
ç¤ºä¾‹3
è¾“å…¥: nums = [3,3], target = 6
è¾“å‡º: [0,1]

æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•

ä¸¤å±‚å¾ªç¯éå†å³å¯ã€‚

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n^2)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.1 ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution1(object):
    # --------------------æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•--------------------
    def twoSum(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: int
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        # ä¸¤å±‚å¾ªç¯éå†
        for i in range(len(nums)):
            for j in range(len(nums)-i-1):
                if nums[i] + nums[j+1+i] == target:
                    return [i, j+1+i]
	
	return []


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.1
    s = Solution1()
    in_put_1 = [2, 7, 11, 15]
    in_put_2 = 9
    result = s.twoSum(in_put_1, in_put_2)
    print(result)

å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨å¯ä»¥é™ä½æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘åˆ°éœ€è¦è¿”å›ä¸‹æ ‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨dictæ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚c++ä¸­åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨mapã€‚

  • æ³¨æ„è¦é¿å…å…ƒç´ ä¸è‡ªèº«åŒ¹é…ï¼Œå› æ­¤å°†å…ƒç´ åŠ å…¥å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨çš„æ“ä½œåº”åœ¨æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¹‹åã€‚
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n)
# No.1 ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution1(object):
    # --------------------å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨(å­—å…¸)--------------------
    def twoSumHash(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: int
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        hash_t = {}
        for i, num in enumerate(nums):
            if target - num in hash_t:  # å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨æŸ¥æ‰¾
                return [i, hash_t[target - num]]

            hash_t[num] = i  # éœ€åœ¨æŸ¥æ‰¾æ“ä½œä¹‹å

        return []


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # No.1
    s = Solution1()
    in_put_1 = [2, 7, 11, 15]
    in_put_2 = 9
    result_H = s.twoSumHash(in_put_1, in_put_2)
    print(result_H)

3.2.5 å››æ•°ç›¸åŠ II(No.454)

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

ç»™å®šå››ä¸ªç›¸åŒé•¿åº¦çš„åŒ…å«æ•´æ•°çš„æ•°ç»„åˆ—è¡¨A,B,C,D,è®¡ç®—æœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ªå…ƒç»„(i, j, k, l)ï¼Œä½¿å¾—A[i] + B[j] + C[k] + D[l] =0

ç¤ºä¾‹
è¾“å…¥:
A = [ 1, 2]
B = [-2,-1]
C = [-1, 2]
D = [ 0, 2]
è¾“å‡º: 2
ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç»„ä¸º(0, 0, 0, 1), (1, 1, 0, 0)

æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•

ä½¿ç”¨4å±‚å¾ªç¯éå†ã€‚leetcodeä¸Šç›´æ¥è¶…å‡ºæ—¶é—´é™åˆ¶ã€‚

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n^4)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(1)
# No.454 å››æ•°ç›¸åŠ II ç±»å‹ï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
class Solution454(object):
    # --------------------æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•--------------------
    def fourSumCount(self, nums1, nums2, nums3, nums4):
        """
        :type nums1: List[int]
        :type nums2: List[int]
        :type nums3: List[int]
        :type nums4: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
